parts.original_title: ジャッカー電撃隊: The Movie
parts.overview: Ryu obsessively pursues a CRIME agent who steals a powerful new explosive and takes control of a powerful supercar. This is a theatrical presentation of episode 7 of the J.A.K.Q. Dengekitai television series.

parts.title: Battle Fever J: The Movie
parts.original_title: バトルフィーバーJ THE MOVIE
parts.overview: Egos kidnaps the children of Information Supervisor Sakaguchi, Yoko and Kenichi. They then blackmail him into stealing the blueprints and completion status of the Battle Fever robo. Tetsuzan Shogun, who joined the Defense Department at the same time as Sakaguchi, is greatly concerned and confronts him. Sakaguchi escapes but vows to make amends. He appears at Egos factory, where they too are building a giant robo, and discloses a false timetable. When Egos orders them killed, Sakaguchi reveals dynamite strapped to his body. He backs away with his children and gets them to safety. He then returns to the factory, and blows himself up to destroy it. Unfortunately, his sacrifice is in vain, as their evil robo is already completed. But Battle Fever’s giant robo is also complete and ready to save the day!

parts.title: Denshi Sentai Denjiman: The Movie
parts.original_title: 電子戦隊デンジマン THE MOVIE
parts.overview: When a mother with an unexpected origin is held hostage by the Vader Clan, the Denziman must come to her rescue.

parts.title: Taiyo Sentai Sun Vulcan: The Movie
parts.original_title: 太陽戦隊サンバルカンTHE MOVIE
parts.overview: A Sun Vulcan movie was released on July 18, 1981 at the Toei Manga Festival. It takes place some time after episode 23. In it Black Magma decides to separate Hiba from his teammates while plotting to blow up Tokyo with hidden bombs.

parts.title: Dai Sentai Goggle-V: The Movie
parts.original_title: 大戦隊ゴーグルファイブ THE MOVIE
parts.overview: Goggle V must prevent Deathdark from using their new laser weapon to destroy Tokyo. This movie takes place some time between episodes 8 and 14 of the Goggle-V TV series.

parts.title: Kagaku Sentai Dynaman: The Movie
parts.original_title: 科学戦隊ダイナマン THE MOVIE
parts.overview: The Dynaman must prevent a powerful new gun invented by a friend of Doctor Yumeno from falling into the hands of the Jashinka.

parts.title: Choudenshi Bioman: The Movie
parts.original_title: 超電子バイオマン THE MOVIE
parts.overview: Bioman must rescue two boys who possess an ancient treasure map that leads to Biobase, making them targeted by Gear.

parts.title: Dengeki Sentai Changeman: The Movie
parts.original_title: 電撃戦隊チェンジマン THE MOVIE
parts.overview: The Changeman must work with an earthquake institute to prevent Earth from being destroyed in a sea of fire by the Gozma.

parts.title: Dengeki Sentai Changeman: Shuttle Base! The Critical Moment!
parts.original_title: 電撃戦隊チェンジマン　シャトルベース！危機一髪！
parts.overview: After a Space Beast throws them off Shuttle Base, the Changeman scramble to get their ship back as Sayaka tries to protect it from the inside.

parts.title: Choushinsei Flashman: The Movie
parts.original_title: 超新星フラッシュマン THE MOVIE
parts.overview: The Flashman find themselves protecting a puppy targeted by Mess due to it being the weakness of a chimera Beast Warrior.

parts.title: Choushinsei Flashman: Big Rally! Titan Boy!
parts.original_title: 超新星フラッシュマン 大逆転! タイタンボーイ!!
parts.overview: Big Rally! Titan Boy! is the second movie of Choushinsei Flashman. It is a theatrical edit of episodes 15 to 18 (The Giant Robo is Worn Out, The Human Minimini Plan, The Mysterious Giant Reckless Car! and Big Turnaround! The Transforming Robo) with new and extended scenes.

parts.title: Hikari Sentai Maskman: The Movie
parts.original_title: 光戦隊マスクマンTHE MOVIE
parts.overview: Takeru fights to rescue a mermaid living in an underground pool being used by Igam to cause massive earthquakes to the surface.

parts.title: Gosei Sentai Dairanger: The Movie
parts.original_title: 五星戦隊ダイレンジャー THE MOVIE
parts.overview: The Dairanger must save children who are transforming into playing cards by the powers of the Duke of Cards.

parts.title: Ninja Sentai Kakuranger: The Movie
parts.original_title: 忍者戦隊カクレンジャー THE MOVIE
parts.overview: When a young boy is kidnapped, his older sister asks the Kakuranger to rescue him.

parts.title: Super Sentai World
parts.original_title: スーパー戦隊 ワールド
parts.overview: The film involves the team-up of five different Super Sentai teams (Ninja Sentai Kakuranger, Gosei Sentai Dairanger, Kyōryū Sentai Zyuranger, Chōjin Sentai Jetman, and Chikyū Sentai Fiveman), who must defend the planet Earth from the evil demon Emperor Daidas. In addition to the five Sentai teams, the film also features Shiro Izumi, who played Yūma Ōzora in Dengeki Sentai Changeman and Burai in Zyuranger, as Masato, a young man who witnesses the Emperor's weak point with his sister Ayumi. Masato and Ayumi also appear in Kamen Rider World, linking the two movies. The narration was provided by Hironori Miyata, the narrator from Dairanger.

parts.title: Chouriki Sentai Ohranger: Olé vs Kakuranger
parts.original_title: 超力戦隊オーレンジャー オーレVSカクレンジャー
parts.overview: The team-up between Choriki Sentai Ohranger and Ninja Sentai Kakuranger. Its footage was used for the Power Rangers Zeo episodes Rangers of Two Worlds I & II.

parts.title: Chouriki Sentai Ohranger: The Movie
parts.original_title: 超力戦隊オーレンジャー The Movie
parts.overview: Prince Bulldont abducts several children and forces them to act in his deadly realistic film, leaving Ohranger to save the day. Takes place between episodes 8 & 9.

parts.title: Gekisou Sentai Carranger vs Ohranger
parts.original_title: 激走戦隊カーレンジャーVSオーレンジャー
parts.overview: The team-up between Gekisou Sentai Carranger and Chouriki Sentai Ohranger.

parts.title: Denji Sentai Megaranger vs Carranger
parts.original_title: 電磁戦隊メガレンジャーVSカーレンジャー
parts.overview: The team-up of Denji Sentai Megaranger and Gekisou Sentai Carranger. This V-Cinema special takes place between episodes 39 and 40 of Denji Sentai Megaranger.

parts.title: Seijuu Sentai Gingaman vs Megaranger
parts.original_title: 星獣戦隊ギンガマンVSメガレンジャー
parts.overview: The team-up between Seijuu Sentai Gingaman and Denji Sentai Megaranger.

parts.title: Kyuukyuu Sentai GoGoFive: Sudden Shock! A New Warrior!
parts.original_title: 救急戦隊ゴーゴーファイブ 激突！新たなる超戦士
parts.overview: Kyuukyuu Sentai GoGoFive: Clash! The New Super Warrior, also known as GoGoFive vs Jieg, is a straight-to-video movie based on Kyuukyuu Sentai GoGoFive.

parts.title: Kyuukyuu Sentai GoGoFive VS Gingaman
parts.original_title: 救急戦隊ゴーゴーファイブVSギンガマン
parts.overview: The team-up between Kyuukyuu Sentai GoGoFive and Seijuu Sentai Gingaman. Its footage was used in the Power Rangers Lightspeed Rescue episodes Trakeena's Revenge parts I & II.

parts.title: Mirai Sentai Timeranger vs GoGoFive
parts.original_title: 未来戦隊タイムレンジャーVSゴーゴーファイブ
parts.overview: Timeranger is joined by GoGoFive when a pesky villain returns to empower the Londerz Criminals in ways that their future technology can't handle!

parts.title: Hyakujuu Sentai Gaoranger vs. Super Sentai
parts.original_title: Hyakujuu Sentai Gaoranger VS Super Sentai
parts.overview: Hyakujuu Sentai Gaoranger vs. Super Sentai is a 2001 Super Sentai Series V-Cinema movie which celebrates the 25th anniversary of the Super Sentai Series. It features a team up of the protagonists of Hyakujuu Sentai Gaoranger with previous heroes of the Super Sentai Series over its twenty-five year history. It is the first vs. movie, followed by Boukenger vs. Super Sentai, in which the current team do not team up with the previous team, rather a veteran team composed of Rangers from various Sentai.

parts.title: Hyakujuu Sentai Gaoranger: The Fire Mountain Roars
parts.original_title: 百獣戦隊ガオレンジャー 火の山、吼える
parts.overview: The theatrical adaptation of Gaoranger that was a double bill with the Kamen Rider Series film Kamen Rider Agito: Project G4. The film features Gao Kong and the Gao Knight combination.

parts.title: Ninpuu Sentai Hurricaneger Shushuuto: The Movie
parts.original_title: 忍風戦隊ハリケンジャー シュシュッと THE MOVIE
parts.overview: The second film outing of the Hurricaneger team. Hurricaneger the theatrical movie introduces new, original hardware and characters, including "Tenrai Senpuujin," the Gattai Robot. Sayaka Yoshino guest stars!

parts.title: Tokusou Sentai Dekaranger The Movie: Full Blast Action
parts.original_title: 特捜戦隊デカレンジャー THE MOVIE フルブラスト・アクション
parts.overview: The Dekarangers must deal with a mysterious undercover agent from another planet while trying to save her world and Earth from one of the universe's toughest Alienizer gangs.

parts.title: Mahou Sentai Magiranger vs. Dekaranger
parts.original_title: 魔法戦隊マジレンジャーVSデカレンジャー
parts.overview: Mahou Sentai Magiranger vs. Dekaranger is the teamup movie between Mahou Sentai Magiranger and Tokusou Sentai Dekaranger.

parts.title: Mahou Sentai Magiranger the Movie: Bride of Infershia
parts.original_title: 魔法戦隊マジレンジャー THE MOVIE インフェルシアの花嫁
parts.overview: Kai and the Magiranger travel from the heights of Magitopia to the depths of Infershia in order to save Yamazaki from becoming the bride who releases a Hades Beastman's phantom army!

parts.title: GoGo Sentai Boukenger vs. Super Sentai
parts.original_title: 轟轟戦隊ボウケンジャー VS スーパー戦隊
parts.overview: "Even today there are those who risk their lives to protect the world. Thirty Super Sentai who protect the Earth from dangerous enemies."  GoGo Sentai Boukenger vs. Super Sentai is a multiple Sentai crossover film that celebrates the 30th Anniversary of the Super Sentai series. The team-up includes the Boukengers and special guests MagiYellow, AbareBlack, HurricaneBlue, DekaBreak, and MagiShine. They are joined by an unknown Ranger named AkaRed.

parts.title: GoGo Sentai Boukenger The Movie: The Greatest Precious
parts.original_title: 轟轟戦隊ボウケンジャーTHE MOVIE 最強のプレシャス
parts.overview: A mysterious being called Muse awakens, announcing the Precious to whoever gets to her first, causing a 5-way confrontation between the Boukengers, Gajah, the Jaryuu, DarkShadow and the Questers.

parts.title: Tokusou Sentai Dekaranger: 10 YEARS AFTER
parts.original_title: 特捜戦隊デカレンジャー: 10 YEARS AFTER
parts.overview: Eight years after saving the SPD from Agent Abrella's scheme, the Dekarangers parted ways with Ban joining the Fire Squad, Jasmine marrying Hikaru Hiwatari, and Swan working independently while Tetsu, Hoji, Sen, and Umeko continue working under Doggie Kruger. But after an incident occurred that hospitalized Kruger on planet Revaful wherein he was labeled as a dirty cop for an apparent dealing with the Qurlian Crime Family, which went awry with the death of a civilian witness, Tetsu takes over the Earth Branch. Two years later, joined by rookie officers Assam Asimov and Mugi Grafton, who had taken over the positions of Deka Red and Deka Yellow respectively, Hoji, Sen and Umeko encounter a Clementian named Carrie who is being hunted by Mechanoids.

parts.title: Ninpuu Sentai Hurricaneger: 10 YEARS AFTER
parts.original_title: 忍風戦隊ハリケンジャー 10 YEARS AFTER
parts.overview: A space ninja group initiate mysterious bombings around the world - from Paris, to Egypt, China, and many others. Nanami and Kouta followed the series of incidents, but were surprised to see a familiar figure appearing before them! It was mentioned that a mistake was made from a battle 10 years ago. This is a V-Cinema, direct to video, movie to commemorate the 10th anniversary of Ninpu Sentai Hurricaneger.

parts.title: Mashin Sentai Kiramager vs. Ryusoulger
parts.original_title: 魔進戦隊キラメイジャーVSリュウソウジャー
parts.overview: It's the power of Kiramentality and chivalry in the 27th entry of the Super Sentai VS film series! The Mashin Sentai Kiramager and the Kishiryu Sentai Ryusoulger team-up as they end up in a variety of movie worlds produced by Yodonna and filmmaking Jamenshi and Minosaur! Once this movie is complete and released in the world, the Earth will become the same environment as Yodonheim! Can the Kiramagers and Ryusoulgers stop this plan?!

parts.title: Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger vs. Kiramager vs. Senpaiger
parts.original_title: 機界戦隊ゼンカイジャーVSキラメイジャーVSセンパイジャー
parts.overview: Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger vs. Kiramager vs. Senpaiger is a Japanese superhero crossover film between Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger Mashin Sentai Kiramager, and serves as the 28th installment of the Super Sentai's VS series of films.

parts.title: Avataro Sentai Donbrothers vs. Zenkaiger
parts.original_title: 暴太郎戦隊ドンブラザーズVSゼンカイジャー
parts.overview: Divided into three acts, the first act is about the Zenkaigers dealing with a new Kashiwa Mochi World and Zocks declares himself as "Kashiwa Mochi King", the ruler of Zenkaitopia?! In the second act, it's been a year since Taro left and the five companions continue to fight as a team with Jiro as their leader. Taro later regains his memories, only for his companions to ask him to leave the Donbrothers. In the final act, an incident caused the two worlds to connect, thus a full-throttle miracle battle between the two Super Sentai begins!

parts.title: Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger The Movie: Red Battle! All Sentai Rally!!
parts.original_title: 機界戦隊ゼンカイジャー THE MOVIE 赤い戦い！ オール戦隊大集会！！
parts.overview: The 2021 Super Sentai, Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger, debuts in a movie! Previous generations of monsters show up but team leader Zenkaiser won't let them have their way! Previous generations of Red Rangers run into battle too! Zenkaiser isn't a Red Ranger, but does that even make sense? With the power of the Machine World, he'll defeat them at Full-Force Full-Throttle!

parts.title: Mashin Sentai Kiramager the Movie: Bebop Dream
parts.original_title: 魔進戦隊キラメイジャー THE MOVIE ビー・バップ・ドリーム
parts.overview: The Kiramagers face off against the witch Minjo, who controls dreams. The heroes experience the feeling of falling off a building, swimming with a giant gold fish, being shot by a gun that turns them into a puppet, and having a shaved ice maker over their head. With Juru’s insight, will the Kiramagers be able to escape from the crazy dreams?

parts.title: Avataro Sentai Donbrothers The Movie: New First Love Hero
parts.original_title: 暴太郎戦隊ドンブラザーズ THE MOVIE 新・初恋ヒーロー
parts.overview: The Donbrothers are offered to appear in a movie based on Haruka's debut manga, which she allegedly plagiarized, First Love Hero by talented producer Reiko Mieda! She can't hide that she is upset about the offer. Will the plagiarism be revealed? That said, shooting for the movie is a mess and the Noto even got parts! What is happening with the movie's shooting?! ​

parts.title: Zyuden Sentai Kyoryuger The Movie: The Gaburincho of Music!
parts.original_title: 劇場版 獣電戦隊キョウリュウジャー ガブリンチョ・オブ・ミュージック
parts.overview: The Kyoryuger saves Mikoto Amano, nicknamed Meeko, from a horde of Zorima who invaded her concert venue. It turns out that Daigo once met Meeko in France. Before they can catch up, the ancient knight Deathryuger, aka D, appears and kidnaps her. D’s goal is to use the secret legendary battery #00, to take control of the mysterious Tobaspino. The Kyoryugers go after "D" to rescue Meeko and prevent him from gaining control over the legendary Zyudenryu.

parts.title: Zyuden Sentai Kyoryuger: 100 YEARS AFTER
parts.original_title: 帰ってきた獣電戦隊キョウリュウジャー 100YEARS AFTER
parts.overview: 100 years in the future, the descendants of Daigo, Ian, Nobuharu, Souji, Amy, and Utsusemimaru must fight back against the revived Deboth.

parts.title: Ressha Sentai ToQger vs. Kyoryuger: The Movie
parts.original_title: 烈車戦隊トッキュウジャーVSキョウリュウジャー
parts.overview: ToQger vs. Kyoryuger will see the twelve rangers from both teams join forces to fight against an evil super giant. They must also save the Galaxy Line, which is falling from space. To make matters worse, the five main ToQgers are turned into children by a Shadow Monster.

parts.title: Ressha Sentai ToQger The Movie: Galaxy Line S.O.S.
parts.original_title: 車戦隊トッキュウジャーＴＨＥ ＭＯＶＩＥギャラクシーラインＳＯＳ
parts.overview: The film follows the Safari Ressha who run the Galaxy Line, their conductor named Lady, and the Shadow Line member pursuing them.

parts.title: Ressha Sentai ToQger Returns: Super ToQ #7 of Dreams
parts.original_title: 行って帰ってきた烈車戦隊トッキュウジャー 夢の超トッキュウ7号
parts.overview: The year is 2025, 10 years after the fight against Z. The ToQgers are all grown up and have now entered life. But one day, the Shadow Line reappears and the fight must resume. Right and his friends try to repel them but they can’t transform because they lack imagination. Fortunately for them, a mysterious purple warrior appears to save them. Will they be able to defeat the Evil Army Shadow Line once and for all? Will they find the ultimate imagination?

parts.title: Shuriken Sentai Ninninger vs. ToQger the Movie: Ninjas in Wonderland
parts.original_title: 手裏剣戦隊ニンニンジャーVSトッキュウジャー THE MOVIE 忍者・イン・ワンダーランド
parts.overview: The Ninningers come across a new enemy, Dark Doctor Mavro, a remnant of the Shadow Line, who created his own, evil version of Aka Ninger serving under him by stealing the real Aka Ninger's Nintality, and because of it, Takaharu's life is now in danger. All hope seems lost until the Ninningers meet the ToQgers, who fought and defeated the Shadow Line in the past, and it's up to them to join forces in order to overcome this new crisis.

parts.title: Come Back! Shuriken Sentai Ninninger: Ninnin Girls vs. Boys FINAL WARS
parts.original_title: 帰ってきた手裏剣戦隊ニンニンジャー　ニンニンガールズVSボーイズ FINAL WARS
parts.overview: The Igasaki Clan reunites two years after defeating Kibaoni Gengetsu to determine who is the greatest ninja.

parts.title: Shuriken Sentai Ninninger The Movie: The Dinosaur Lord's Splendid Ninja Scroll!
parts.original_title: 手裏剣戦隊ニンニンジャー THE MOVIE 恐竜殿さまアッパレ忍法帖！
parts.overview: The Last Ninja Yoshitaka Igasaki sends his disciples the Ninningers on a special mission over summer vacation to Shinobigakure Castle to meet its lord Tatsunosuke Hakkaku. However, Lord Hakkaku has been turned into a strange dinosaur-like creature by a strange curse, while Kibaoni Army Corps general Juza Yumihari has arrived in the village as well, seeking its "legendary evil dragon".

parts.title: Doubutsu Sentai Zyuohger vs. Ninninger the Movie: Super Sentai's Message from the Future
parts.original_title: 劇場版 動物戦隊ジュウオウジャーVSニンニンジャー 未来からのメッセージ from スーパー戦隊
parts.overview: The chronology of Super Sentai may, at last, be at an end. A boy has arrived from the future to save the earth from catastrophe. Yamato and his team are not aware that they are part of the enemy's plans. The Ninningers, who once protected Earth, have returned! And this time, they believe the Zyuohger are Yokai monsters! This battle will be the end of both teams. Will the message of the future boy get to Yamato in time? An unbelievable roll call that brings together all the Rangers of the Super Sentai! In 2017 the battle of all battles begins!

parts.title: Doubutsu Sentai Zyuohger the Movie: The Heart Pounding Circus Panic!
parts.original_title: 劇場版 動物戦隊ジュウオウジャー ドキドキ サーカス パニック！
parts.overview: Step right up, everybody, the Space Circus Troupe is in town! Their ringleader, Domidoll, wants to turn all Zyumen evil and have them join his circus. However, the Zyuohgers won’t let him! Can the Zyuohgers protect everyone?

parts.title: Doubutsu Sentai Zyuohger Returns: Life Theft! Champion of Earth Tournament
parts.original_title: 帰ってきた動物戦隊ジュウオウジャー お命頂戴! 地球王者決定戦
parts.overview: Taking place after the end of the series, Doubutsu Sentai Zyuohger Returns will focus on Zyumans and humans peacefully co-exist on Earth. It is then decided that they'll have a battle to determine who will rule the Earth, but a real danger lurks in the shadows.

parts.title: Uchuu Sentai Kyuranger The Movie: The Geth Indaver Strikes Back!
parts.original_title: 宇宙戦隊キュウレンジャー THE MOVIE ゲース・インダベーの逆襲
parts.overview: With Shou presumably dead, and the Earth being threatened by a new villain, the remaining 11 Kyurangers must travel across the Cerberus System for the means to stop the mysterious Geth Indaver from destroying the entire planet.

parts.title: Uchuu Sentai Kyuranger: Episode of Stinger
parts.original_title: 宇宙戦隊キュウレンジャー Episode of スティンガー
parts.overview: While conducting a liberation mission on Planet Sleeby of the Norma constellation, Stinger and Champ are attacked by Jark Matter and fall into a valley where they remember a common unforgettable past.

parts.title: Kaitou Sentai Lupinranger VS Keisatsu Sentai Patranger Transformation Course: Lupin X - Patren X Edition
parts.original_title: 変身講座 ルパンエックス・パトレンエックス編 快盗戦隊ルパンレンジャーVS警察戦隊パトレンジャー
parts.overview: Kaitou Sentai Lupinranger VS Keisatsu Sentai Patranger Transformation Course: Lupin X - Patren X Edition is the third installment of the Kaitou Sentai Lupinranger VS Keisatsu Sentai Patranger Transformation Course web series. It was released to accompany episode 22 of the series.

parts.title: Toei TV Hero Encyclopedia Vol. 2: Chojin Sentai Jetman
parts.original_title: 東映テレビヒーロー図鑑 VOL. 2 鳥人戦隊ジェットマン
parts.overview: A happily married Ryu Tendo (Red Hawk) and Kaori Rokumeikan (White Swan) reminisce about their time as part of the Jetman team defending Earth from the invasion of Dimensional War Party Vyram. The bulk of the special is the couple taking turns narrating an overview of the events of Jetman with footage from the 51-episode series.

parts.title: Chojin Sentai Jetman: Jetmen Finishing Move Graffiti
parts.original_title: 鳥人戦隊ジェットマン ジェットマン必殺技グラフィティ！
parts.overview: Chojin Sentai Jetman: Jetmen Finishing Move Graffiti is a Bandai VHS for Choujin Sentai Jetman.

parts.title: Kyoryu Sentai Zyuranger Dino Video
parts.original_title: 恐竜戦隊ジュウレンジャー ダイノビデ
parts.overview: The first «Super Video» movie in Super Sentai franchise, this time based on Kyoryu Sentai Zyuranger.

parts.title: Ninja Sentai Kakuranger Super Video: The Hidden Scroll
parts.original_title: テレビマガジン特製 忍者戦隊カクレンジャースーパービデオ 秘伝之巻
parts.overview: The video has the five Kakurangers listing off the five keys of being a ninja as found in a hidden scroll locked in their secret headquarters.

parts.title: Chouriki Sentai Ohranger Super Video: Ole! Chouriki Information Bureau
parts.original_title: 超力戦隊オーレンジャー スーパービデオ オーレ!超力情報局
parts.overview: Chouriki Sentai Ohranger Super Video: Ole! Chouriki Information Bureau is the second Super Video of Chouriki Sentai Ohranger.

parts.title: Chouriki Sentai Ohranger Super Video: Member Notebook
parts.original_title: 超力戦隊オーレンジャー スーパービデオ 隊員手帳
parts.overview: Chouriki Sentai Ohranger Super Video: Member Notebook is the first Super Video of Chouriki Sentai Ohranger.

parts.title: Gekisou Sentai Carranger Super Video: Hero School
parts.original_title: 激走戦隊カーレンジャー スーパービデオ ヒーロースクール
parts.overview: Gekisou Sentai Carranger Super Video: Hero School is the Super Video of Gekisou Sentai Carranger.

parts.title: Denji Sentai Megaranger Super Video: You Can Be One Too! A Mega Hero
parts.original_title: 電磁戦隊メガレンジャー スーパービデオ きみもなれるぞ！メガヒーロー
parts.overview: Denji Sentai Megaranger Super Video: You Can Be One Too! A Mega Hero is the Super Video of Denji Sentai Megaranger.

parts.title: Seijuu Sentai Gingaman Super Video: The Secret Fruit of Wisdom
parts.original_title: 星獣戦隊ギンガマン スーパービデオ ひみつのちえの実
parts.overview: Seijuu Sentai Gingaman Super Video: The Secret Fruit of Wisdom is the Super Video of Seijuu Sentai Gingaman.

parts.title: Kyukyu Sentai GoGoFive: Five Lessons of Rescue Spirits
parts.original_title: 救急戦隊ゴーゴーファイブ レスキューたましい五つのおしえ
parts.overview: Kyukyu Sentai GoGoFive: Five Lessons of Rescue Spirits is the Super Video of Kyukyu Sentai GoGoFive.

parts.title: Mirai Sentai Timeranger Super Video: All the Strongest Hero Secrets
parts.original_title: 未来戦隊タイムレンジャー スーパービデオ 最強ヒーロー全ひみつ
parts.overview: A direct-to-video release made specifically for Mirai Sentai Timeranger. It talks about the Timerangers' story so far and showcases the Timerangers' weapons and mecha.

parts.title: Hyakujuu Sentai Gaoranger Super Video: Showdown! Gaoranger vs. Gao Silver
parts.original_title: Hyakujuu Sentai Gaoranger Super Video: Showdown! Gaoranger vs. Gao Silver
parts.overview: The five GaoJewels of the Gaorangers are pulled into the Holy Spring. GaoSilver appears and his GaoJewel also flies into it. He challenges the five Gaorangers, wanting them to tell him what the five "Gao Teachings" were.

parts.title: Bakuryū Sentai Abarenjā 20th: Yurusa Rezaru Abare
parts.original_title: 爆竜戦隊アバレンジャー20th: 許されざるアバレ
parts.overview: 20 years after their battle with the Evolians had ended, a new threat appears to threaten the long-lasting peace that the Abarangers have enjoyed. For the first time in a long while, they transform to fight but the public seems to think their actions are barbaric acts of destruction. In the Reiwa Era, is the justice they once fought for now considered an outdated style of heroism?

parts.title: Tokusou Sentai Dekaranger 20th: Fireball Booster
parts.original_title: 特捜戦隊デカレンジャー20th ファイヤーボール・ブースター
parts.overview: Celebrating the 20th anniversary of the Tokusou Sentai Dekaranger series, the six detectives who fight with cool and burning hearts gather again to face the "Great Plan" that threatens peace on Earth!

parts.title: Ninpu Sentai Hurricaneger Degozaru! Shushuuto 20th Anniversary
parts.original_title: 忍風戦隊ハリケンジャーでござる！シュシュッと20th Anniversary
parts.overview: It is the Edo Period. Younosuke, Nami, and Koutaro of the Hayate School and Ikkaku and Ikki of the Ikazuchi School are confronted by Oiranda and Aunja of the "Seven Spears of Darkness" and then Teruhime, whom the two Ikazuchi School members guard, is attacked. They were after the "Tenshoishi" ("Ascension Stone"), a stone said to be capable of destroying the world, which was in Teruhime's possession. Just when all seemed to be lost, the Hurricangers and the Gouraigers suddenly appear, having traveled back in time from the future, and a fierce battle ensues.

parts.title: Ninpuu Sentai Hurricaneger with Donbrothers
parts.original_title: 忍風戦隊ハリケンジャーwithドンブラザーズ
parts.overview: Ninpuu Sentai Hurricaneger with Donbrothers is a Japanese superhero tokusatsu crossover short film released exclusively on TTFC, featuring Donbrothers teaming up with Hurricanegers.

parts.title: Bakuryū Sentai Abarenjā with Donburazāzu
parts.original_title: 爆竜戦隊アバレンジャーwithドンブラザーズ
parts.overview: Yukito, who gave Shinichi Saruhara/Saru Brother chiropractic treatment sees that Shinichi and Haruka Kito/Oni Sister are Super Sentai members, causing Ryoga to reveal that they are the Bakuryuu Sentai Abaranger. While listening to their story, Shinichi is shocked to discover the big difference of personality between AbaRed and Don Momotaro. A Hitosuki later appears.

parts.title: Abatarō Sentai Donburazāzu Supin-Ofu: Kore ga Donburazāzu no Nanori da! Abatarō no Honto no Sugata!?
parts.original_title: 暴太郎戦隊ドンブラザーズ スピンオフ　コレがドンブラザーズの名乗りだ！暴太郎のホントの姿！？

parts.title: Avataro Sentai Donbrothers vs. Avataro Sentai Donburies
parts.original_title: 暴太郎戦隊ドンブラザーズVS暴太郎戦隊ドンブリーズ
parts.overview: The Avataro Sentai Donburies, which first appeared in Avataro Sentai Donbrothers' press conference gets a TTFC special!

parts.title: Bakuryuu Sentai Abaranger Super Video: All Bakuryuu Roaring Laughter Battle
parts.original_title: 爆竜戦隊アバレンジャー スーパービデオ オール爆竜 爆笑バトル
parts.overview: Bakuryuu Sentai Abaranger Super Video: All Bakuryuu Roaring Laughter Battle is the Televi Super Video of Bakuryuu Sentai Abaranger.

parts.title: Tokusou Sentai Dekaranger: Super Finisher Match! Deka Red vs. Deka Break
parts.original_title: 特捜戦隊デカレンジャー スーパービデオ 超必殺わざ勝負! デカレッドVSデカブレイク
parts.overview: During a training session, Ban and Tetsu try to prove they are the strongest of the SPD.

parts.title: Mahou Sentai Magiranger: Revealed! The Gold Grip Phone's Super Magic
parts.original_title: Mahou Sentai Magiranger: Revealed! The Gold Grip Phone's Super Magic
parts.overview: This DVD features Kai Ozu coming into possession of a Golden Grip Phone while Hikaru attempts to teach the boy the importance of always telling the truth.

parts.title: Juken Sentai Gekiranger: Gyun-Gyun! Fist Sage Great Athletic Meet
parts.original_title: 獣拳戦隊ゲキレンジャーギュンギュン！拳聖大運動会
parts.overview: After their latest win, the three Gekirangers find the Kensei stretching for their annual Kensei Great Athletic Meet. Jan, wanting to win the gold medal and a year's supply of Televi magazines, joins the Red Team to go against the White Team. With Retsu as judge and Ran as moderator, the contest starts...

parts.title: Engine Sentai Go-Onger Special DVD: It's a Seminar! Everyone GO-ON!!
parts.original_title: 炎神戦隊ゴーオンジャー スペシャルDVD ゼミナールだよ!全員GO-ON!
parts.overview: A special DVD in which Bomper lets each of the Go-Ongers do their own special seminar on ecology and also tie into the three Gaiark Pollution Ministers.

parts.title: Ressha Sentai ToQger Final Live Tour 2015
parts.original_title: 烈車戦隊トッキュウジャー ファイナルライブツアー2015
parts.overview: A live show that was performed across Japan in March and April of 2015, acting as a final farewell for the cast. It comprises two parts: a scripted show part, and a talk show with the cast. This show features the only appearance of Yami No 0gou. The Ninningers also appear.

parts.title: Zyuden Sentai Kyoryuger Final Live Tour 2014
parts.original_title: Zyuden Sentai Kyoryuger Final Live Tour 2014
parts.overview: "You'll be surprised when you'll heaaar-! Kyoryuger Final Battle!!"  A live show that was performed across Japan in March and April of 2014, acting as a final farewell for the cast. It comprises two parts: a scripted show part, and a talk show with the cast. The ToQgers also appear in.

parts.title: Zyuden Sentai Kyoryuger Brave 33.5: This is Brave! Battle Frontier
parts.original_title: これぞブレイブ！たたかいのフロンティア
parts.overview: A special episode of Zyuden Sentai Kyoryuger, produced and released four years following its conclusion, which served as a collaboration with the mobile game Brave Frontier 2.

parts.title: Zyuden Sentai Kyoryuger: It's Here! Armed On Midsummer Festival!!
parts.original_title: 獣電戦隊キョウリュウジャー でたァーッ！まなつのアームド・オンまつり!!
parts.overview: Utsusemimaru returned from beach in dismay due to seeing women in swimsuits. Returning to the Spirit Base, Daigo prepared an indoor beach for Utchi to have fun together. Later, they find Nobuharu tamed by the two festival-themed Debo monsters. Daigo first used the Allomerus Zyudenchi and the Ovirapoo Zyudenchi, then Utchi used the Igaranodon Zyudenchi with an old man gag, which Daigo enjoys.

parts.title: Uchuu Sentai Kyuranger: Final Stage
parts.original_title: 宇宙戦隊キュウレンジャー スペシャルイベント
parts.overview: Annual Super Sentai stage show featuring the cast and characters from the 41st Super Sentai, Uchu Sentai Kyuranger (Space Squadron Kyuranger).

parts.title: Uchu Sentai Kyuranger Final Live Tour 2018
parts.original_title: Uchu Sentai Kyuranger Final Live Tour 2018
parts.overview: "Sing, Dance, and let's have Fun!"  A live show that was performed across Japan in March and April of 2018, acting as a final farewell for the cast. It comprises two parts: a scripted show part, and a talk show with the cast. The Lupinrangers and the Patrangers also appear in.

parts.title: Doubutsu Sentai Zyuohger Final Live Tour 2017
parts.original_title: 動物戦隊ジュウオウジャー ファイナルライブツアー2017
parts.overview: The Doubutsu Sentai Zyuohger Final Live Tour 2017 is a live show that was performed across Japan in March and April of 2017, acting as a final farewell for the cast. It comprises two parts: a scripted show part, and a talk show with the cast. The Kyurangers also appear.

parts.title: Come Back! Tensou Sentai Goseiger: Last Epic - The Gosei Angels are National Idols?!
parts.original_title: 帰ってきた天装戦隊ゴセイジャー last epic ～護星天使が国民的アイドルに?!
parts.overview: While dealing with the harassing public, the Goseigers face a new enemy along with old revived foes.

parts.title: Shuriken Sentai Ninninger: Final Live Tour 2016
parts.original_title: 手裏剣戦隊ニンニンジャー ファイナルライブツアー2016
parts.overview: A stage show to go along with Shuriken Sentai Ninninger.

parts.title: Shuriken Sentai Ninninger: AkaNinger vs. StarNinger Hundred Nin Battle!
parts.original_title: 手裏剣戦隊ニンニンジャー アカニンジャーVSスターニンジャー 百忍バトル!
parts.overview: After arguing about whose fashion sense is better, Takaharu and Kinji go outside with their costumes to be judged by the public. Expectedly, they are laughed at due to their outrageous costumes. They then notice a dark aura surrounding several stones, which Kinji depicts as Hyakki Yakou, an event in summer where a hundred Youkai would revive and destroy the town at night.

parts.title: Ohsama Sentai King-Ohger: Adventure Heaven
parts.original_title: 映画 王様戦隊キングオージャー アドベンチャー・ヘブン
parts.overview: During the grand coronation ceremony of Gira as king, the door to "Hakabaka, the Land of the Dead" is suddenly opened! What unprecedented ordeal awaits Gira and the other six kings in the Land of the Dead? Will the young kings be able to return to their original world? Will Gira, the "self-proclaimed king," become the true King of Shugoddam?!

parts.title: Ohsama Sentai King-Ohger: Combination Lesson
parts.original_title: 王おう様さま戦セン隊タイキングオージャー合体講座

parts.title: Avataro Sentai Donbrothers meets Senpaiger
parts.original_title: 「暴太郎戦隊ドンブラザーズ」 meets 「センパイジャー」
parts.overview: A short movie based on Avataro Sentai Donbrothers TV series and released on Bandai YouTube channel.

parts.title: Kishiryu Sentai Ryusoulger Special Chapter: Memory of Soulmates
parts.original_title: 騎士竜戦隊リュウソウジャー 特別編 メモリー・オブ・ソウルメイツ
parts.overview: Linked to episodes 32 and 33 of the Ryusoulger TV series, the movie will reveal the meaning of Nada’s video message which he left for the Ryusoulgers at the end of episode 33.

parts.title: Zenkai!! Twokai!? Need for Development!! G-Rosso Last Fight!!: Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger Show Series Level 4
parts.original_title: 全開！！痛快！？まさかの展カイ！！Gロッソ最後の戦い！！ 機界戦隊ゼンカイジャーショー シリーズ第4弾
parts.overview: Zenkai!! Twokai!? Need for Development!! G-Rosso Last Fight!!: Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger Show Series Level 4 is a stage show based on Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger TV series. The recorded version was released after the performance period concluded.

parts.title: Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger Show Series Level 3 Special Show: Legendary Power Full-Force Full-Throttle! Holy Land-Shaking Great Fierce Battle!
parts.original_title: 機界戦隊ゼンカイジャーショー シリーズ第3弾特別公演 伝説パワー全力全開！聖地を揺るがす大激闘！
parts.overview: Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger Show Series Part 3 Special Show: Legendary Powers Full-Force Full-Throttle! Great Fierce Battle Shaking the Holy Land! is a stage show celebrating the 50th Anniversary of Super Hero stage shows. Held at Theater G-Rosso from October 30th 2021 to January 16th 2022, the stage show was recorded and released on Toei Tokusatsu Fan Club.

parts.title: Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger Final Live Tour 2022
parts.original_title: 機界戦隊ゼンカイジャー ファイナルライブツアー2022
parts.overview: The Zenkai Sentai Zenkaiger Final Live Tour 2022  Until the Final-'ish' Zenkai!!

parts.title: Mashin Sentai Kiramager: G-Rosso Stage Show Final Battle Shine! Glittering Light!
parts.original_title: Mashin Sentai Kiramager: G-Rosso Stage Show Final Battle Shine! Glittering Light!
parts.overview: A stage show based on Mashin Sentai Kiramager, later recorded and released digitally.

parts.title: Mashin Sentai Kiramager Final Live Tour 2021
parts.original_title: 魔進戦隊キラメイジャー ファイナルライブツアー
parts.overview: A live show that was performed across Japan in April and May of 2021, acting as a final farewell for the cast. It comprises two parts: a scripted show part, and a talk show with the cast. The Zenkaigers also appear.

parts.title: Kishiryu Sentai Ryusoulger The Movie: Time Slip! Dinosaur Panic!!
parts.original_title: 騎士竜戦隊リュウソウジャー THE MOVIE タイムスリップ！恐竜パニック!!
parts.overview: This is the 2019 summer movie for Kishiryu Sentai Ryusoulger. It is twin-billed with the summer movie for Kamen Rider Zi-Oi: Kamen Rider Zi-O: Over Quartzer!. It will feature the debut of Ryusoul Gattai Kishiryuzin.

parts.title: Kaitou Sentai Lupinranger VS Keisatsu Sentai Patranger Final Live Tour 2019
parts.original_title: 快盗戦隊ルパンレンジャーVS警察戦隊パトレンジャー ファイナルライブツア2019
parts.overview: A stage show for Kaitou Sentai Lupinranger VS Keisatsu Sentai Patranger that serves as an epilogue to the series, showing what takes place after the events of the final episode. It was held at 8 different city theaters from March to April in 2019. The Ryusoulgers also appear.

parts.title: Kaitou Sentai Lupinranger + Keisatsu Sentai Patranger ~The Ultimate Weird Combination!~
parts.original_title: Kaitou Sentai Lupinranger + Keisatsu Sentai Patranger ~The Ultimate Weird Combination!~
parts.overview: A two part spin-off miniseries of Kaitou Sentai Lupinranger VS Keisatsu Sentai Patranger only featured in Video Pass.

parts.title: Kaitou Sentai Lupinranger VS Keisatsu Sentai Patranger ~GIRLFRIENDS ARMY~
parts.original_title: 快盗戦隊ルパンレンジャーVS警察戦隊パトレンジャー ~GIRLFRIENDS ARMY~
parts.overview: Kaitou Sentai Lupinranger VS Keisatsu Sentai Patranger ～GIRLFRIENDS ARMY～ is a Hyper Battle DVD, that showcase various features of the series and its armament. The DVD will feature the series’ heroines, Umika Hayami and Tsukasa Myoujin.

parts.title: Ressha Sentai ToQger DVD Special: Farewell, Ticket! The Wasteland Super ToQ Battle!
parts.original_title: 烈車戦隊トッキュウジャー　さらばチケットくん！　荒野の超トッキュウバトル!!」だ!!
parts.overview: Akira wakes up with Ticket stuck to his hand. Along with Right, they fight off another puppet which has attached itself to Schwartz.

parts.title: They're Back! Tokumei Sentai Go-Busters vs. Doubutsu Sentai Go-Busters
parts.original_title: 帰ってきた特命戦隊ゴーバスターズvs動物戦隊ゴーバスターズ
parts.overview: This V-Cinema release takes place between Missions 44 & 45. While preparing to celebrate New Year's, the Go-Busters are all killed by a monster named Azazel. Finding himself (and J) before God in Heaven, Nick uses his status as the one millionth person to die in 2012 to grant his wish that Messiah never existed. He awakens to find a changed world, where the Busters are now known as the Dobutsu Sentai Go-Busters.

parts.title: Tokumei Sentai Go-Busters: Rising New Hero - Director's Cut Edition
parts.original_title: 特命戦隊ゴーバスターズ ライジングニューヒーロー ディレクターズカット版
parts.overview: Chief Kuroki tells the team that they will soon be meeting Beet Buster and his new Buddy Roid, but before any introduction can be made, the Soujikiloid attacks. Soon after Hiromu learns that the two new Go-Busters originated from Hyper Space, he challenges them to a duel, suspicious of their motives. This is a director's cut version of episodes 15 & 16 of the Tokumei Sentai Go-Busters TV series.

parts.title: Tokumei Sentai Go-Busters Final Live Tour 2013
parts.original_title: 特命戦隊ゴーバスターズ ファイナルライブツアー2013
parts.overview: A live show that was performed across Japan in March and April of 2013, acting as a final farewell for the cast. It comprises two parts: a scripted show part, and a talk show with the cast. The Kyoryugers also appear.

parts.title: Tokumei Sentai Go-Busters vs. Beet Buster vs. J
parts.original_title: 特命戦隊ゴーオンジャーバスターズ対ビートバスター対J
parts.overview: Beet J Stag goes berserk after drinking a Vaglass produced Enetron can. No one could stop J, who thinks of himself as a king. What's worse, Enter manages to transform into Beet Buster! What will Masato and the Go-Busters do to stop them? Furthermore, Space Sheriff Gavan also makes a short appearance here.

parts.title: Tensou Sentai Goseiger: Final Live Tour 2011
parts.original_title: Tensou Sentai Goseiger: Final Live Tour 2011
parts.overview: Tensou sentai Goseiger: Final Live Tour

parts.title: Samurai Sentai Shinkenger Final Live Tour 2010
parts.original_title: 侍戦隊シンケンジャー ファイナルライブツアー2010
parts.overview: A live show that was performed across Japan in March and April of 2010, acting as a final farewell for the cast. It comprises two parts: a scripted show part, and a talk show with the cast. The Goseigers also appear.

parts.title: Samurai Sentai Shinkenger Director's Cut
parts.overview: A director's cut of Samurai Sentai Shinkenger's first two episodes was released on DVD on August 6th 2010. It was re-released on Bluray Volume 1 on February 7th 2014.

parts.title: Engine Sentai Go-Onger: Final Live Tour 2009
parts.original_title: 炎神戦隊ゴーオンジャー ファイナルライブツアー2009
parts.overview: DVD release of the live stage show featuring Engine Sentai Go-Onger in 2009.

parts.title: Hero Mama ★ League
parts.overview: Nanami, Jasmine and Houka, who once fought to bring peace to the world, are now happily married and with children. However, the evil that threatens humanity is immortal, and now they must face a daily struggle to balance their fight as "heroes" and their duty as "mamas". It is their goal to succeed at that struggle and to keep the world safe, becoming the brightest of "glittering mamas". The three thought of the plan to make it happen whilst at a café, but at the same time, Space Shinobu Demost's terrifying plan to invade the Earth moves into action!

parts.title: Drishyam
parts.overview: Georgekutty lives a happy life with his wife and daughters. Things take a turn when his daughter gets indecently filmed using a hidden camera, by the son of a police inspector.

parts.title: Drishyam 2
parts.overview: 7 years after the events of Drishyam, the family lives with the trauma from that fateful night. A gripping tale of an investigation and a family threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?

974847.name: Money. Murder. Zurich. Collection
974847.overview: collection of the "Money. Murder. Zurich." movies

parts.title: Money. Murder. Zurich.: Borchert and the fatal error
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und der fatale Irrtum
parts.overview: Lawyer Dominique Kuster can feel a professional success for herself when her underage client Stefan, the oldest of three foster children, receives mitigating circumstances. After the court hearing, however, she found out that the foster father Christian Hunziker had a fatal accident in a car. An autopsy reveals that it was murder. Someone has swapped the dead man's insulin for ineffective water. Christian's wife Martina comes under suspicion.

parts.title: Money. Murder. Zurich.: Borchert and the deadly trap
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und die tödliche Falle
parts.overview: Borchert wants to toast three years of successful cooperation with his superior Dominique Kuster and her father, Reto Zanger. The evening is canceled because Reto Zanger is called to Geneva at short notice for a mandate. His daughter is therefore supposed to represent him at a court hearing in Zurich. The trial takes a dramatic turn when inmate Alexander Böni takes those involved as hostages.

parts.title: Money. Murder. Zurich.: Borchert's deduction
parts.overview: Attorney Thomas Borchert is in custody, where he is accused of bribery and embezzlement. His former supervisor Horst Zeidler advises him to take the blame in order to then make a deal with the public prosecutor. Borchert rejects the offer. He wants to prove his innocence by legal means and is looking for a suitable defense for himself in court.

parts.title: Money. Murder. Zurich.: Borchert and the icy death
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und der eisige Tod
parts.overview: When Borchert receives an anonymous message that a certain Franz Brosi is innocent, law firm boss Dominique can hardly believe it. After all, Brosi was her first client as a public defender a few years ago and had actually confessed. The two are investigating the case.

parts.title: Money. Murder. Zurich.: Borchert and the original sin
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und der Sündenfall

parts.title: Money. Murder. Zurich.: Borchert and the murderous greed
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und die mörderische Gier
parts.overview: The lawyers Borchert and Kuster are investigating a case involving a young student who has come under the crosshairs of a terrorist group.

parts.title: Money. Murder. Zurich.: Borchert and the last hope
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und die letzte Hoffnung
parts.overview: Anton Schneider says goodbye to his wife Luise in tears and dies. Schneider was seriously ill with multiple sclerosis and was diagnosed by neurologist Dr. Hoffer medically treated. Luise Schneider reports the doctor and accuses him of incorrect treatment of her husband, which ultimately led to his death. The mandate against Dr. Hoffer takes over Dominique Kuster, who entrusts her employee Thomas Borchert with the investigation.

parts.title: Money. Murder. Zurich.: Borchert and the dead in the lake
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und der Tote im See
parts.overview: Thomas Borchert is already looking forward to his goddaughter Jenny, who is completing a practical semester in Albania. At the airport, as part of the baggage check, half a kilo of hashish is seized from her, which Jenny claims she did not know anything about. Borchert and Dominique Kuster want to find out who could have put the hash on her. They also have to solve the murder of an entrepreneur who was involved in crooked business.

parts.title: Money. Murder. Zurich.: Borchert and the power of habit
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und die Macht der Gewohnheit
parts.overview: The building contractor Hubert Thalmann is found stabbed to death by the young burglars Tim and Robin in his villa. The next day Tim goes to the police, the lawyer Thomas Borchert and his superior Dominique Kuster represent the youth in all subsequent instances. They believe in his innocence because he is also covering his friend Robin. During the investigation it turns out that both Thalmann's wife Vera and his brother Bernard have a motive.

parts.title: Money. Murder. Zurich.: Borchert and the murder in the cab
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und der Mord im Taxi
parts.overview: Borchert and Dominique Kuster take over the defense of the taxi driver Jrg Zollinger. Captain Furrer suspects him of the murder of a passenger, the African investigative journalist Nuka Baluba. All the evidence incriminates the uncontrolled suspect, whose testimony initially seems unreliable. Borchert is suspicious of the fact that public prosecutor Dietrich is quick to commit to Zollinger. The "lawyer without a license" suspects that Baluba's research into child labor in cobalt mines in the Congo has something to do with the murder.

parts.title: Money. Murder. Zurich.: Borchert and the time to die
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und die Zeit zu sterben

parts.title: Money. Murder. Zurich.: Borchert and the lost son
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und der verlorene Sohn

parts.title: Money. Murder. Zurich.: Borchert and the dark shadows
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und die dunklen Schatten

parts.title: Money. Murder. Zurich.: Borchert and the secret of the client
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und das Geheimnis des Mandanten

parts.title: Money. Murder. Zurich.: Borchert and the bitter medicine
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und die bittere Medizin

parts.title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und die Sünden der Vergangenheit
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und die Sünden der Vergangenheit

parts.title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und der Mord ohne Sühne
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und der Mord ohne Sühne

parts.title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und die Spur der Diamanten
parts.original_title: Der Zürich-Krimi: Borchert und die Spur der Diamanten

parts.title: The Way We Dance
parts.overview: After dropping out of her university's dance crew, a working-class student finds inspiration in tai chi for her own unique style of street dancing.

parts.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
parts.overview: The Kowloon Industrial District is home to many of Hong Kong’s artists, including rapper Heyo, YouTuber Alan, rising star Hana, and dancer. However, the government is preparing the area for gentrification. The group from ‘The Way We Dance’ were invited to participate in a publicity stunt to transform the district into a ‘Dance Street’. Alan points out that this is an opportunity to garner support from the public. Meanwhile, Heyo’s master Afuc is planning a revolution.

parts.title: Runaway God of Wealth 2
parts.overview: Wang Jiacheng, a real estate salesman who is constantly being hit by life, meets the God of Wealth on the rooftop! After accidentally kicking the God of Wealth's magic weapon, he is faced with two choices: fix the magic weapon and be rich and prosperous, or don't fix the magic weapon and be thunderstruck!

parts.title: You vs. Wild: Out Cold
parts.overview: After a plane crash leaves Bear with amnesia, he must make choices to save the missing pilot and survive in this high-stakes interactive adventure.

parts.title: Animals on the Loose: A You vs. Wild Interactive Movie
parts.original_title: Animals on the Loose: A You vs. Wild Interactive Movie
parts.overview: When there’s a power outage at a safari reserve, Bear Grylls is called and he needs your help. The situation is dire: an escaped lion is headed for a nearby village; a baboon has broken free and is going towards the sea cliffs, and the power must be restored before more animals escape.

519564.name: Las Leyendas Collection
519564.overview: A children's movie and television franchise based on Mexican folklore.

parts.title: The Legend of the Nahuala
parts.overview: Leo San Juan, an insecure child of nine years old, lives eternally frightened by horror stories that Nando tells his older brother. Within these stories it is 'The Legend of Nahuala', according to which, an old abandoned Casona is possessed by the spirit of an evil witch known as the Nahuala.

parts.title: Legend Quest: The Legend of the Guanajuato Mummies
parts.original_title: La Leyenda de las Momias de Guanajuato
parts.overview: Three friends confront a horde of mummies, who have inexplicably awakened, and try to rescue their pal, not realizing they have fallen into a trap.

parts.title: The Legend of La Llorona
parts.overview: Based on a famous Mexican legend, a group of kids must stop the ghost of a woman whose guilt over the drowning of her own children leads her to abduct youngsters who wander the woods at night.

parts.title: The Legend of the Chupacabras
parts.overview: Leo San Juan and his team of "ghostbusters" continue with their adventures, this time fighting against the mexican monster himself: "El Chupacabras".

parts.title: The Legend of the Black Charro
parts.overview: After releasing the Chupacabras, Leo San Juan decides that it is time to return together with his brother Nando to his grandmother's house. Halfway down the road, Charro Negro manages to confuse Leo and because of him, an innocent girl is dragged into the underworld. Leo is forced to repair the damage. Your friends will come to try to help you and get out of there as soon as possible. But it is no coincidence that the Charro has chosen to involve Leo, his intentions go beyond getting a new soul.

parts.title: Las Leyendas: El Origen
parts.overview: When a human baby crosses the Eternal Mirror, the portal between the living and the death opens its path to the beings from the underworld.

parts.title: La Leyenda de los Chaneques
parts.overview: Five years after giving up his powers and separating from his friends, Leo San Juan has started a new life trying to focus on his family and their bakery, staying away from danger and adventures. However, Leo knows that his plans are rarely fulfilled and this time is no exception: while traveling with Nando to Veracruz, things start to get weird, and from the depths of the Tuxtlas jungle, an ancient curse has returned and only Leo can face it.

256322.name: The Purge Collection
256322.overview: A horror thriller film series based on a future dystopian America, where all crime is made legal once a year.

parts.title: The Purge
parts.overview: Given the country's overcrowded prisons, the U.S. government begins to allow 12-hour periods of time in which all illegal activity is legal. During one of these free-for-alls, a family must protect themselves from a home invasion.

parts.title: The Purge: Anarchy
parts.overview: One night per year, the government sanctions a 12-hour period in which citizens can commit any crime they wish -- including murder -- without fear of punishment or imprisonment. Leo, a sergeant who lost his son, plans a vigilante mission of revenge during the mayhem. However, instead of a death-dealing avenger, he becomes the unexpected protector of four innocent strangers who desperately need his help if they are to survive the night.

parts.title: The Purge: Election Year
parts.overview: Two years after choosing not to kill the man who killed his son, former police sergeant Leo Barnes has become head of security for Senator Charlene Roan, the front runner in the next Presidential election due to her vow to eliminate the Purge. On the night of what should be the final Purge, a betrayal from within the government forces Barnes and Roan out onto the street where they must fight to survive the night.

parts.title: The First Purge
parts.overview: To push the crime rate below one percent for the rest of the year, the New Founding Fathers of America test a sociological theory that vents aggression for one night in one isolated community. But when the violence of oppressors meets the rage of the others, the contagion will explode from the trial-city borders and spread across the nation.

parts.title: The Forever Purge
parts.overview: All the rules are broken as a sect of lawless marauders decides that the annual Purge does not stop at daybreak and instead should never end as they chase a group of immigrants who they want to punish because of their harsh historical past.

437451.name: Cinderella Story Collection
437451.overview: A Cinderella Story is a 2004 American romantic comedy film directed by Mark Rosman, written by Leigh Dunlap and stars Hilary Duff, Chad Michael Murray, Jennifer Coolidge and Regina King. A modernization of the classic Cinderella folk lore, the film's plot revolves around two Internet pen pals who plan meet in person at their high school's Halloween dance. The film was followed by five direct-to-video sequels, Another Cinderella Story (2008), A Cinderella Story: Once Upon a Song (2011), A Cinderella Story: If the Shoe Fits (2016), A Cinderella Story: Christmas Wish (2019), and A Cinderella Story: Starstruck (2021). The sequels using the themes and situations but not containing any characters from the first film. Unlike the first film, the sequels also include musical, dance, and holiday themes.

parts.title: A Cinderella Story
parts.overview: Routinely exploited by her wicked stepmother, the downtrodden Samantha Montgomery is excited about the prospect of meeting her Internet beau at the school's Halloween dance.

parts.title: Another Cinderella Story
parts.overview: A guy who danced with what could be the girl of his dreams at a costume ball only has one hint at her identity: the Zune she left behind as she rushed home in order to make her curfew. And with a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity in front of him, he sets out to find his masked beauty.

parts.title: A Cinderella Story: Once Upon a Song
parts.original_title: A Cinderella Story: Once Upon a Song
parts.overview: In this modern telling of the classic tale, aspiring singer Katie Gibbs falls for the new boy at her performing arts high school. But Katie's wicked stepmother and stepsister are scheming to crush her dream before she can sing her way into his heart.

parts.title: A Cinderella Story: If the Shoe Fits
parts.original_title: A Cinderella Story: If the Shoe Fits
parts.overview: A contemporary musical version of the classic Cinderella story in which the servant step daughter hope to compete in a musical competition for a famous pop star.

parts.title: A Cinderella Story: Christmas Wish
parts.overview: Kat is an aspiring singer-songwriter who dreams of making it big. However, her dreams are stalled by her reality: a conniving and cruel stepfamily  and a demoralizing job working as a singing elf at billionaire Terrence Wintergarden’s Santa Land.

parts.title: A Cinderella Story: Starstruck
parts.overview: Finley Tremaine, a small-town farm girl, longs to spread her wings and soar as an aspiring performer. When a Hollywood film crew arrives in her sleepy town, she is determined to land a role in the production and capture the attention of handsome lead actor Jackson Stone. Unfortunately, a botched audition forces her to change course. Now, disguised as cowboy “Huck,” Finley finally gets her big break. But can she keep the charade a secret from everyone, including her evil stepmother and devious step-siblings?

parts.title: Saikoyou Keisatsukan 2
parts.overview: A police officer rehired after retiring investigates a case.

1108593.name: Ripper Untold Collection
1108593.overview: A collection of Jack the Ripper films directed by Steven Lawson.

parts.title: Ripper Untold
parts.overview: A detective and a medical examiner join forces to solve a series of horrific murders in Victorian London - but one of them harbors a deadly secret.

parts.title: Ripper's Revenge
parts.overview: One year on from the notorious Ripper murders, London is terrorised once again by a series of brutal killings. When gruesome letters from the Ripper begin landing on his desk, an innocent reporter finds himself drawn into a deadly mystery, threatening the lives of everyone around him.

790370.name: Fear Street Collection
790370.overview: Three film adaptations of the book series by R. L. Stine.

parts.title: Fear Street: 1994
parts.overview: After a series of brutal slayings, a teen and her friends take on an evil force that's plagued their notorious town for centuries.

parts.title: Fear Street: 1978
parts.overview: In 1978, two rival groups at Camp Nightwing must band together to solve a terrifying mystery when horrors from their towns' history come alive.

parts.title: Fear Street: 1666
parts.overview: In 1666, a colonial town is gripped by a hysterical witch-hunt that has deadly consequences for centuries to come, and it's up to teenagers in 1994 to finally put an end to their town's curse, before it's too late.

896356.name: Kamen Rider Saber × Ghost Collection
896356.overview: Two-part crossover between characters of Kamen Rider Saber and Kamen Rider Ghost TV series.

parts.title: Kamen Rider Saber × Ghost
parts.original_title: 仮面ライダーセイバー✕ゴースト
parts.overview: Touma and Mei find a girl who is looking for her brother. When they try to talk to her, she is attacked by Desast and runs away. Why is Desast after her? Meanwhile, as he’s looking for Kanon, Takeru Tenkuji finds survivors of Danton’s experiments and vows he won’t let them be sad like Chloe was. When he goes off to look for more survivors, he runs into Touma and Mei…

parts.title: Kamen Rider Specter × Blades
parts.original_title: 仮面ライダースペクター×ブレイズ
parts.overview: Serving as a sequel to Kamen Rider Saber × Ghost, Rintaro joins forces with both Makoto Fukami and Kanon Fukami to take down the remnants of Danton's evil forces.

997726.name: Rompis Collection
997726.overview: Rompis is a 2018 romantic drama film directed by Monty Tiwa.  The sequel will be released in 2021, directed by Rudi Aryanto.  This film is adapted from a novel entitled Roman Picisan by Eddy D. Iskandar.

parts.title: Rompis
parts.overview: After a student starts his college education abroad, a new friendship creates distance between him and his concerned girlfriend back home.

parts.title: Rompis: Tentang Sahabat
parts.overview: Vacation has arrived, Sam and Roman return to Jakarta. On the sidelines of his vacation Sam meets Yola, a musician who captivates his heart. But their togetherness was disturbed by Radit. Will Sam and Yola still be together?

602538.name: Non ci resta che il crimine - Collezione

parts.title: All You Need is Crime
parts.original_title: Non ci resta che il crimine
parts.overview: In the present day, three friends to make ends meet invent a "criminal tour" for the places which were scenes of the Banda della Magliana criminal acts, even with vintage clothes. Suddenly they are catapulted in the 1982, during the Spain World Cup, facing the real Banda della Magliana, which at that time had the control over illegal bets.

1204557.name: 绝美的世界各地4K美景之旅

parts.title: Stunning Hawaiian Oahu 4K - Scenic Relaxation Film
parts.original_title: Stunning Hawaiian Oahu 4K - Scenic Relaxation Film

852743.name: BanG Dream! Episode of Roselia Collection
852743.overview: A film duology in the BanG Dream! franchise about the origins of the band Roselia.

parts.title: BanG Dream! Episode of Roselia I: Promise
parts.original_title: BanG Dream! Episode of Roselia I: 約束
parts.overview: Yukina Minato gathers members intertwined with different thoughts to form a band and participate at the Future World Fes. This is the story of their "promise" from their formation to the challenge of the music festival.

parts.title: BanG Dream! Episode of Roselia II: Song I am.
parts.original_title: BanG Dream! Episode of Roselia II: Song I am.
parts.overview: After overcoming numerous tribulations, the members of Roselia promised to appear on FUTURE WORLD FES.  It is now Autumn... Through writing the lyrics of "Promise," Lisa has matured. Watching the change of color in the autumn leaves, Yukina and Sayo expressed their resolve in a picture letter to their future selves. Driven by the wish to do something for Roselia, Rinko has started to compose a new song. "The remaining quests are the contest, the tournament, and FUTURE WORLD FES..." Reflecting on their goals, Ako starts to feel anxious. What view will the five of them see beyond FUTURE WORLD FES?

parts.title: Ostap Bender. The Beginning
parts.overview: Russian Empire, 1919. By a twist of fate, young idealist Osip Zadunaisky meets an infamous con artist and self-proclaimed Turkish subject Ibrahim Bender. A man of pure thought and aristocratic upbringing, Osip would never have associated with a cunning and unscrupulous swindler, but Bender comes up with an offer Osip cannot refuse. A precious royal relic, a diamond-encrusted golden scepter is hidden somewhere in town; Bender needs a partner on his mission to find it, and offers Osip a share of the profit from selling the treasure. And so begins their joint venture, wrought with comical and dangerous twists and turns, where they have to outsmart and outmaneuver officers of the White Guard as well as the local mafia, who also have their eyes on the scepter. As their quest unfolds, Osip is compelled to learn Bender’s tricks of the trade: charming flattery, delicate deception, soft intimidation... as well as brute force.

parts.title: Ostap Bender. The Empire's Gold
parts.overview: The hunt for imperial gold continues. A priceless scepter, a treasure that could secure a worry-free life in sunny Rio de Janeiro for Ibrahim Bender and his young apprentice Ostap, has slipped from under their noses and ended up in possession of Nestor Makhno, an anarchist army commander. Makhno is convinced that the scepter is one of many imperial relics hidden in the area. With mafia, partisans, and officers of the Red and White armies all determined to get their hands on the fabled gold cache, Ostap and his mentor Ibrahim must surpass their own brilliance to outmaneuver their rivals and snatch the prize. And with Ostap’s beloved fair maiden losing her trust in him, he must do everything in his power to win her back and stop her from marrying another man.

parts.title: Ostap Bender: The Final Hustle
parts.overview: 1919, Solnechnomorsk. Talented adventurers have become too unexpected: now they are wanted by the Russian and Turkish police. They go to the south of Russia to take possession of the golden scepter of Count Rumyantsev. In pursuit of a precious little thing, terrorists, circus performers and even participating ladies can dress up as them. Meanwhile, Ostap’s mother is approaching the paws of the gloomy Satanist Crowley, in whose treasury, by a mysterious coincidence, there is also a scepter ...

parts.title: The Ice Road
parts.overview: After a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada, an ice road driver must lead an impossible rescue mission over a frozen ocean to save the trapped miners.

parts.title: The Ice Road 2: Road to the Sky
parts.original_title: The Ice Road 2: Road to the Sky
parts.overview: Mike goes to Nepal to sprinkle his brother ashes on Mount Everest. When Mike and his mountain guide come upon a bunch of mercenaries while traveling on a tour bus they are forced to fight to save themselves, the passengers and the country.

parts.title: Operation Portugal
parts.overview: Hakim, 35, a friendly neighborhood cop, must infiltrate the Portuguese community for the purpose of an investigation. But can one become Portuguese in three days? Especially when we know that Hakim is a walking disaster at undercover operations. His clumsiness and bad luck turn his many infiltrations into cataclysms. The case is clearly too big for him. Quickly trapped between his feelings and his mission, Hakim, who lives alone with his mother, will discover a community, but also a family.

parts.title: Opération Portugal 2 - La vie de château
parts.original_title: Opération Portugal 2 - La vie de château
parts.overview: Hakim has to foil the plans of a shady developer : the count of Neuville. Helped by his friends, he seeps into the count's castle, but he also has to prepare his wedding with Julia.

1158686.name: Heard She Got Married Collection
1158686.overview: Heard She Got Married is a 2021 film by Motern Media. In 2023 a sequel, Heard She Got Murdered, was released.

parts.title: Heard She Got Married
parts.overview: A musician is suspicious of his mailman.

parts.title: Heard She Got Murdered
parts.overview: After the terrifying events of HEARD SHE GOT MARRIED, the extremely talented musician Mitch Owens (Matt Farley) is ready to move on with his life, but before he can achieve the success he deserves, fate intervenes! Now, Mitch must face horrifying secrets from his past, death around every corner, and an officer of the law who will not rest until bloody justice is served.

785583.name: Batman: The Long Halloween Collection
785583.overview: A two-part collection based on the highly popular graphic novel, where Batman must stop a mysterious killer named Holiday, who murders people on holidays each month.

parts.title: Batman: The Long Halloween, Part One
parts.original_title: Batman: The Long Halloween, Part One
parts.overview: Following a brutal series of murders taking place on Halloween, Thanksgiving, and Christmas, Gotham City's young vigilante known as the Batman sets out to pursue the mysterious serial killer alongside police officer James Gordon and district attorney Harvey Dent.

parts.title: Batman: The Long Halloween, Part Two
parts.original_title: Batman: The Long Halloween, Part Two
parts.overview: As Gotham City's young vigilante, the Batman, struggles to pursue a brutal serial killer, district attorney Harvey Dent gets caught in a feud involving the criminal family of the Falcones.

689974.name: Teen Titans Go! Collection
689974.overview: This collection contains all the full-length cartoons with the heroes of Teen Titans Go!

parts.title: Teen Titans Go! To the Movies
parts.original_title: Teen Titans Go! To the Movies
parts.overview: All the major DC superheroes are starring in their own films, all but the Teen Titans, so Robin is determined to remedy this situation by getting over his role as a sidekick and becoming a movie star. Thus, with a few madcap ideas and an inspirational song in their hearts, the Teen Titans head to Hollywood to fulfill their dreams.

parts.title: Teen Titans Go! vs. Teen Titans
parts.original_title: Teen Titans Go! vs. Teen Titans
parts.overview: The comedic modern-day quintet takes on their 2003 counterparts when villains from each of their worlds join forces to pit the two Titan teams against each other. They'll need to set aside their differences and work together to combat Trigon, Hexagon, Santa Claus (that's right, Santa!) and time itself in order to save the multiverse.

parts.title: Teen Titans Go! See Space Jam
parts.original_title: Teen Titans Go! See Space Jam
parts.overview: The Teen Titans are visited by the Nerdlucks, the Space Jam villains who tried to capture Michael Jordan and the Looney Tunes. Astonished to discover his fellow Titans have never seen Space Jam, Cyborg organizes an exclusive watch party.

parts.title: Teen Titans Go! & DC Super Hero Girls: Mayhem in the Multiverse
parts.original_title: Teen Titans Go! & DC Super Hero Girls: Mayhem in the Multiverse
parts.overview: With the help of an ancient Kryptonian power, Lex Luthor unites the world’s Super-Villains to capture all of Earth's Super Heroes, until…only the DC Super Hero Girls are left to stop the Legion of Doom. Our heroes must cross dimensions to rescue their fellow Super Heroes from the Phantom Zone, but a fortuitous wrong turn leads them to Titans Tower – where they find much-needed allies in the Teen Titans!

857332.name: Speech & Debate Collection
857332.overview: Short films regarding two rivals in the craziness of high school speech and debate.

parts.title: Speech & Debate
parts.overview: In the cut-throat world of High School Speech & Debate, if you aren’t a winner, you’re a loser

parts.title: Speech & Debate: The Aftermath
parts.overview: Competition in the time of quarantine.

parts.title: Speech & Debate: Legacy
parts.overview: Gil and Kandice are back, and it's all about Legacy.

parts.title: Heavily in Love!
parts.overview: The young, successful vet Isa is a little unsure about her body and love. Ruben is the perfect man. Good looking, works with his hands and loves his labrador Bo dearly. One day when Isa saves Bo from a chocolate poisoning, she falls for his owner like a glove. And he for her, but Isa doesn't dare to believe ...

parts.title: Heavily in Love 2
parts.overview: Opposites Isa and Ruben are totally in love and over the moon with each other. Until Mr. Perfect steps into Isa's life.

131780.name: Whispering Corridors Collection
131780.overview: The "Whispering Corridors" series (Korean title "Yeogo goedam" lit. translation "Girl's High School") uses an all girl's high school as the backdrop for each of its films.  Characters, setting, and stories are different for each of the films released under the "Whispering Corridors" title.

parts.title: Whispering Corridors
parts.overview: The ghost of a student who died at a Korean school comes back to seek vengeance and protect her friends.

parts.title: Memento Mori
parts.overview: The ghost of a lesbian high-school girl takes revenge on the people who used to bully her. And another young girl finds her old diary detailing her love and rejection when she was alive.

parts.title: Wishing Stairs
parts.overview: A staircase leading to a schoolgirls' dormitory usually has 28 steps, but sometimes a 29th step appears. Any wish you make while standing on this step comes true, even if it must come true in the most horrific way possible.

parts.title: Voice
parts.overview: While practicing after hours in her high school, an aspiring singer is mysteriously killed and her body vanishes. Her invisible ghost is trapped in the school, but her best friend is able to hear her voice.

parts.title: A Blood Pledge
parts.overview: Four friends pledge to commit suicide together but while standing on the ledge, only one of them actually jumps. Her ghost begins to haunt the remaining friends until the pledge is fulfilled.

parts.title: Whispering Corridors 6: The Humming
parts.overview: After being appointed as the vice-principal of her alma mater, Eun-hee becomes plagued by hallucinations. Branded a troublemaker by the teachers, Ha-young hears strange sounds coming from the school's dilapidated restroom.

787188.name: Jacqueline Mazerin Collection
787188.overview: Eric Lavaine films with Josiane Balasko

parts.title: Back to Mom's
parts.overview: At 40, Stephanie loses her job and is forced to move back in with her mother. She is welcomed with open arms to the joys of overheated apartment, Francis Cabrel playing on loop, Scrabble games and precious motherly advice on how to behave at the table and live her life.

parts.title: Knock, Knock, It's Mom!
parts.overview: While her apartment is being renovated, Jacqueline is thrilled to be forced into spending "a few days" with her eldest daughter Carole and her son-in-law, who are both in couples therapy. These "few days" turn into "a few months". Jacqueline quickly feels at home. She prepares dinners, monopolizes the television, reorganizes the kitchen... She is here, and no one knows for how long!

parts.title: Dragon Fury
parts.overview: A group of soldiers are taken to the mountains of Wales to investigate a strange looking monster.

parts.title: Dragon Fury: Wrath Of Fire
parts.overview: After surviving the events of the first movie, Vanessa has gone into hiding after being threatened by the government. However, a group of researchers find her and soon convince her to go back to the mountains, and this time, the dragons are more deadly than ever.

1093903.name: Streetwise Collection
1093903.overview: Martin Bell’s documentary series beginning with Streetwise.

parts.title: Streetwise
parts.overview: This documentary about teenagers living on the streets in Seattle began as a magazine article. The film follows nine teenagers who discuss how they live by panhandling, prostitution, and petty theft.

parts.title: Tiny at 20
parts.overview: Director Martin Bell revisits Erin Blackwell, one of the subjects of this documentary STREETWISE.

parts.title: Tiny: The Life of Erin Blackwell
parts.original_title: Tiny: The Life of Erin Blackwell
parts.overview: Filmmaker Martin Bell chronicles the life of Erin Blackwell, mother of 10 children, from the time she was a 14-year-old prostitute through her battle with drug addiction, poverty and parenting.

parts.title: Erin
parts.overview: Director Martin Bell revisits Erin Blackwell, one of the subjects of his 1984 documentary STREETWISE.

parts.title: Streetwise Revisited: Rat
parts.overview: Filmmaker Martin Bell reconnects with Rat, one of the subjects of his 1984 documentary STREETWISE.

336557.name: The Ouija Experiment Collection
336557.overview: The Ouija Experiment Collection found footage horror movies

parts.title: The Ouija Experiment
parts.overview: Based on true events, five friends who fall prey to the evil entities of the Ouija board. As they set about filming their experimental session, what starts out as bit of fun, soon escalates into a terrifying series of events as paranoia and personal demons are revealed…. and recorded.

parts.title: The Ouija Experiment 2: Theatre of Death
parts.original_title: The Ouija Experiment 2: Theatre of Death
parts.overview: A fun filled weekend turns deadly when a group of unsuspecting theatre goers are trapped inside, after a ravenous spirit is resurrected and released from a Ouija board. They must confront their most terrifying fears and destroy the spirit before it finds and kills them first.

parts.title: Ouija 3: The Charlie Charlie Challenge
parts.overview: An Eccentric haunted house owner invites a group of hapless teens to play the terrifying game known as Charlie Charlie, overnight in the many attractions his house has to offer. While the game is meant to be a mere spectacle of spooky fun, it soon turns into a true nightmare leaving the teenagers, and the owner, battling for their lives.

parts.title: Ouija: Deadly Reunion
parts.overview: As some friends prepare a birthday party in a warehouse, Kay and best friend Noah find a Ouija board in a storage room. They try to contact the spirits of the dead, and strange things begin to happen.

608101.name: The Hitman's Bodyguard Collection
608101.overview: Action Comedy films featuring Ryan Reynolds, Samuel Jackson, and Salma Hayek.

parts.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard
parts.overview: The world’s top bodyguard gets a new client, a hitman who must testify at the International Court of Justice. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time.

parts.title: Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
parts.overview: The world’s most lethal odd couple – bodyguard Michael Bryce and hitman Darius Kincaid – are back on another life-threatening mission. Still unlicensed and under scrutiny, Bryce is forced into action by Darius's even more volatile wife, the infamous international con artist Sonia Kincaid. As Bryce is driven over the edge by his two most dangerous protectees, the trio get in over their heads in a global plot and soon find that they are all that stand between Europe and a vengeful and powerful madman.

parts.title: With/In Volume 1
parts.overview: Giving creatives the chance to step outside the box while being confined to their own homes, the filmmakers behind With/In range from seasoned directors to first-timers, all provided with the same iPhone and basic gear to bring their visions to life.

parts.title: With/In Volume 2
parts.overview: An anthology film that centres around relationships, love and family. A man misses his flight and instead finds love in quarantine, a lonely therapist finds companionship in an unwanted pet, two sisters find courage to say things they never had the words to say, and an unexpected packet of sourdough starter has horrifying and hilarious consequences. These are some of the stories captured in WITH/IN, a collection of thirteen films created by actors and their families during the time that changed our lives forever.

parts.title: Joe Bonamassa - Muddy Wolf at Red Rocks
parts.original_title: Joe Bonamassa - Muddy Wolf at Red Rocks
parts.overview: "They always try to write off the blues; well we’ve proven tonight that at least 9,000 people like the blues," says celebrated blues rock master Joe Bonamassa who releases "Joe Bonamassa – Muddy Wolf At Red Rocks" on DVD, Blu-ray and CD set on March 23, 2015.  The exclusive concert experience, which is a tribute to blues legends Muddy Waters and Howlin’ Wolf, was filmed at Red Rocks Amphitheatre over Labor Day weekend in 2014.

parts.title: Joe Bonamassa - Now Serving Royal Tea Live from the Ryman
parts.original_title: Joe Bonamassa - Now Serving Royal Tea Live from the Ryman
parts.overview: Last year when COVID-19 put the live touring industry on hold, guitar hero Joe Bonamassa did something unprecedented for his fans, he put together a one night only show at the iconic Ryman Auditorium in Nashville, TN to be live streamed for fans everywhere. That night he united people across 44 countries worldwide for a phenomenal live music presentation of his brand new album “Royal Tea” before it was even released.

parts.title: Joe Bonamassa: Live at Radio City Music Hall
parts.original_title: Joe Bonamassa: Live at Radio City Music Hall
parts.overview: In January 2015, Joe Bonamassa took the iconic Great Stage at Radio City Music Hall for the first time for a sold-out, two-night run that allowed him to fulfill his lifelong dream of performing in one of the world’s most legendary venues.

parts.title: Joe Bonamassa - Live at Carnegie Hall - An Acoustic Evening
parts.original_title: Joe Bonamassa - Live at Carnegie Hall - An Acoustic Evening
parts.overview: Live at Carnegie Hall: An Acoustic Evening is the fifteenth live album and video by American blues-rock musician Joe Bonamassa. Produced by Kevin Shirley, it was released on June 23, 2017 by J&R Adventures. The album documents Bonamassa's two performances at the Stern Auditorium, Carnegie Hall in New York City, New York on January 21 and 22, 2016. It is the guitarist and vocalist's second all-acoustic live collection, following 2013's An Acoustic Evening at the Vienna Opera House.
