parts.overview: A mysterious spacecraft captures Russian and American space capsules and brings the two superpowers to the brink of war. James Bond investigates the case in Japan and comes face to face with his archenemy Blofeld.

parts.title: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
parts.overview: James Bond tracks his archnemesis, Ernst Blofeld, to a mountaintop retreat in the Swiss alps where he is training an army of beautiful, lethal women. Along the way, Bond falls for Italian contessa Tracy Draco, and marries her in order to get closer to Blofeld.

parts.title: Diamonds Are Forever
parts.overview: Diamonds are stolen only to be sold again in the international market. James Bond infiltrates a smuggling mission to find out who's guilty. The mission takes him to Las Vegas where Bond meets his archenemy Blofeld.

parts.title: The Man with the Golden Gun
parts.original_title: The Man with the Golden Gun
parts.overview: Cool government operative James Bond searches for a stolen invention that can turn the sun's heat into a destructive weapon. He soon crosses paths with the menacing Francisco Scaramanga, a hitman so skilled he has a seven-figure working fee. Bond then joins forces with the swimsuit-clad Mary Goodnight, and together they track Scaramanga to a Thai tropical isle hideout where the killer-for-hire lures the slick spy into a deadly maze for a final duel.

parts.title: The Spy Who Loved Me
parts.overview: Russian and British submarines with nuclear missiles on board both vanish from sight without a trace. England and Russia both blame each other as James Bond tries to solve the riddle of the disappearing ships. But the KGB also has an agent on the case.

parts.title: Moonraker
parts.overview: After Drax Industries' Moonraker space shuttle is hijacked, secret agent James Bond is assigned to investigate, traveling to California to meet the company's owner, the mysterious Hugo Drax. With the help of scientist Dr. Holly Goodhead, Bond soon uncovers Drax's nefarious plans for humanity, all the while fending off an old nemesis, Jaws, and venturing to Venice, Rio, the Amazon...and even outer space.

parts.title: For Your Eyes Only
parts.overview: A British spy ship has sunk and on board was a hi-tech encryption device. James Bond is sent to find the device that holds British launching instructions before the enemy Soviets get to it first.

parts.title: Octopussy
parts.overview: James Bond is sent to investigate after a fellow “00” agent is found dead with a priceless Indian Fabergé egg. Bond follows the mystery and uncovers a smuggling scandal and a Russian General who wants to provoke a new World War.

parts.title: A View to a Kill
parts.overview: A newly-developed microchip designed by Zorin Industries for the British Government that can survive the electromagnetic radiation caused by a nuclear explosion has landed in the hands of the KGB. James Bond must find out how and why. His suspicions soon lead him to big industry leader Max Zorin who forms a plan to destroy his only competition in Silicon Valley by triggering a massive earthquake in the San Francisco Bay.

parts.title: Licence to Kill
parts.overview: After capturing the notorious drug lord Franz Sanchez, Bond's close friend and former CIA agent Felix Leiter is left for dead and his wife is murdered. Bond goes rogue and seeks vengeance on those responsible, as he infiltrates Sanchez's organization from the inside.

parts.title: GoldenEye
parts.overview: When a powerful satellite system falls into the hands of Alec Trevelyan, AKA Agent 006, a former ally-turned-enemy, only James Bond can save the world from a dangerous space weapon that -- in one short pulse -- could destroy the earth! As Bond squares off against his former compatriot, he also battles Xenia Onatopp, an assassin who uses pleasure as her ultimate weapon

parts.title: Tomorrow Never Dies
parts.overview: A deranged media mogul is staging international incidents to pit the world's superpowers against each other. Now James Bond must take on this evil mastermind in an adrenaline-charged battle to end his reign of terror and prevent global pandemonium.

parts.title: Quantum of Solace
parts.overview: Betrayed by Vesper, the woman he loved, 007 fights the urge to make his latest mission personal. Pursuing his determination to uncover the truth, Bond and M interrogate Mr. White, who reveals that the organization that blackmailed Vesper is far more complex and dangerous than anyone had imagined.

parts.title: Casino Royale
parts.overview: Le Chiffre, a banker to the world's terrorists, is scheduled to participate in a high-stakes poker game in Montenegro, where he intends to use his winnings to establish his financial grip on the terrorist market. M sends Bond—on his maiden mission as a 00 Agent—to attend this game and prevent Le Chiffre from winning. With the help of Vesper Lynd and Felix Leiter, Bond enters the most important poker game in his already dangerous career.

parts.title: The World Is Not Enough
parts.overview: Greed, revenge, world dominance and high-tech terrorism – it's all in a day's work for Bond, who's on a mission to protect a beautiful oil heiress from a notorious terrorist. In a race against time that culminates in a dramatic submarine showdown, Bond works to defuse the international power struggle that has the world's oil supply hanging in the balance.

parts.title: Die Another Day
parts.overview: James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul, who is funding the development of an international space weapon.

parts.title: Skyfall
parts.overview: When Bond's latest assignment goes gravely wrong, agents around the world are exposed and MI6 headquarters is attacked. While M faces challenges to her authority and position from Gareth Mallory, the new Chairman of the Intelligence and Security Committee, it's up to Bond, aided only by field agent Eve, to locate the mastermind behind the attack.

parts.title: Spectre
parts.overview: A cryptic message from Bond’s past sends him on a trail to uncover a sinister organization. While M battles political forces to keep the secret service alive, Bond peels back the layers of deceit to reveal the terrible truth behind SPECTRE.

parts.title: The Living Daylights
parts.overview: After a defecting Russian general reveals a plot to assassinate foreign spies, James Bond is assigned a secret mission to dispatch the new head of the KGB to prevent an escalation of tensions between the Soviet Union and the West.

parts.title: No Time to Die
parts.overview: Bond has left active service and is enjoying a tranquil life in Jamaica. His peace is short-lived when his old friend Felix Leiter from the CIA turns up asking for help. The mission to rescue a kidnapped scientist turns out to be far more treacherous than expected, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

parts.title: Never Say Never Again
parts.overview: James Bond returns as the secret agent 007 to battle the evil organization SPECTRE. Bond must defeat Largo, who has stolen two atomic warheads for nuclear blackmail. But Bond has an ally in Largo's girlfriend, the willowy Domino, who falls for Bond and seeks revenge.

1173440.name: In the Wilds Collection
1173440.overview: Amid a deadly wildfire, an unexpected romance ignites between a forest ranger and a geologist as they race to escape the flames.

parts.title: Romance in the Wilds
parts.overview: Deep in the Rocky Mountains, lightning strikes a mining site, sparking a deadly wildfire and igniting an unexpected romance between a forest ranger and a geologist as they race to escape the flames.

parts.title: Christmas in the Wilds
parts.overview: Buck and Jessica's merry little Christmas together takes a dangerous turn when their journey through the wild turns into a battle for survival.

207621.name: V/H/S Collection
207621.overview: Found footage anthology films centered around a number of disturbing VHS tapes that are discovered by innocent viewers and the possessive influence of the videos over those who see them. Realized by a collaboration of various filmmakers and different casts, the installments are mostly standalone in nature; though recurring elements indicate the same fictional villain as the source for all of its videos.

parts.title: V/H/S
parts.overview: When a group of misfits is hired by an unknown third party to burglarize a desolate house and acquire one rare VHS tape, they discover more found footage than they had bargained for.

parts.title: V/H/S/2
parts.overview: Inside a darkened house looms a column of TVs littered with VHS tapes, a pagan shrine to forgotten analog gods. The screens crackle and pop endlessly with monochrome vistas of static white noise permeating the brain and fogging concentration. But you must fight the urge to relax: this is no mere movie night. Those obsolete spools contain more than just magnetic tape. They are imprinted with the very soul of evil.

parts.title: V/H/S: Viral
parts.overview: As the streets of Los Angeles overflow with camera-wielding gawkers seeking to capture images of a bizarre police pursuit, the same people who sought to exploit the suffering of others for amusement on the Internet become the stars of a gruesome viral video from which no one gets out alive.

parts.title: V/H/S/94
parts.overview: After the discovery of a mysterious VHS tape, a brutish police SWAT team launches a high-intensity raid on a remote warehouse, only to discover a sinister cult compound whose collection of pre-recorded material uncovers a nightmarish conspiracy.

parts.title: V/H/S/99
parts.overview: A thirsty teenager's home video leads to a series of horrifying revelations, harkening back to the final punk rock analog days of VHS, while taking one giant leap forward into the hellish new millennium.

parts.title: V/H/S/85
parts.overview: Unveiled through a made-for-TV documentary, five chilling tales of found footage horror emerge to take viewers on a gore-filled journey through the grim underbelly of the forgotten 1980s.

parts.title: Untitled V/H/S Sequel
parts.overview: Seventh installment in the V/H/S franchise, which will focus on sci-fi horror.

1059888.name: Savage X Fenty Collection
1059888.overview: Series of shows by Rihana's Fenty brand.

parts.title: Savage X Fenty Show Vol. 4
parts.overview: A seductive fashion fever dream that blends style, dance, and music with the hypnotic essence of nocturnal nature. Featuring a star-studded cast all wearing the newest Savage X Fenty looks, the show is an un-missable visual feast.

parts.title: Savage X Fenty Show
parts.overview: The Savage X Fenty Show gives a look into Rihanna's creative process for her latest lingerie collection. Modeled by incredible, diverse talent; celebrating all genders and sizes; and featuring performances by the hottest music artists.

parts.title: Savage X Fenty Show Vol. 3
parts.overview: Get ready for the launch of Rihanna's 2021 Savage X Fenty collection. Celebrating togetherness and community in a post pandemic world, this year’s show will be for viewers to turn in and get lost in absolute joy.

parts.title: Savage X Fenty Show Vol. 2
parts.overview: Rihanna invites you to a high energy and visually stunning experience where you can watch and shop her latest lingerie line. Hear from Rihanna, those closest to her, and go behind-the-scenes of the Savage X Fenty brand as you sit front row to see top artists and models featuring Travis Scott, Rosalia, Bad Bunny, Lizzo, Cara Delevingne, Miguel, Bella Hadid, Normani, Willow Smith and many more.

673604.name: A Menina que Matou os Pais
673604.overview: Two psychological thrillers surrounding the real murders of Manfred and Marísia von Richthofen orchestrated by their own daughter, Suzane, along with her boyfriend and brother-in-law, the Cravinhos brothers.

parts.title: The Girl Who Killed Her Parents
parts.original_title: A Menina que Matou os Pais
parts.overview: Based on one of the most shocking and gruesome murder cases in Brazil, the film presents Daniel Cravinhos's point of view of the events that led to the death of Marísia and Manfred von Richthofen, his girlfriend’s parents.

parts.title: The Boy Who Killed My Parents
parts.original_title: O Menino Que Matou Meus Pais
parts.overview: Based on one of the most shocking and gruesome murder cases in Brazil, the film presents de Suzane von Richthofen's point of view of the events that led to the death of her parents.

parts.title: The Girl Who Killed Her Parents: The Confession
parts.original_title: A Menina que Matou os Pais: A Confissão
parts.overview: See what Suzane von Richthofen, Daniel Cravinhos and Cristian Cravinhos did in the days following the brutal crime that led to the Richthofen couple's death. This film reveals crucial moments of the police investigation, testimonies and the confession of the crime.

parts.title: Qismat
parts.overview: Shiva is just looking to sow some wild oats before settling down, until he falls in love with his beautiful neighbor.

parts.title: Qismat 2
parts.overview: A story about unrequited love – the shapes it takes, the ways it changes us, and the exhilarating and often heartbreaking ride it takes us on. It is the journey of three characters – Shiv, Bani, and Majaz, on how their lives intertwine and navigate through life, love, and heartbreak.

893229.name: Princess Principal Crown Handler Collection
893229.overview: The stage is the late 19th century. The Kingdom of Albion was divided due to the Republican Revolution. The capital city of London is divided by a huge wall. The east side is ruled by the Kingdom and the west side is ruled by the Republic. It has become the front line of the Shadow War where spies from various countries are active. Ten years after the revolution, five girls disguised as high school girls appeared at Mayfair Queen's School, a prestigious school in the kingdom, and acted as spies for the Republic. After preventing the Queen's assassination attempt and recuperating in Casablanca, they received new instructions from Control. Taking this mission as an opportunity, the five girls - Team Bai Ge - began to be involved in the huge whirlpool that shook the country.

parts.title: Princess Principal Crown Handler: Chapter 1
parts.original_title: プリンセス・プリンシパル Crown Handler 第1章
parts.overview: Control — the Commonwealth's covert ops group — suspects a double agent within the Kingdom's royal family and dispatches Ange and the rest of "Team White Pigeon" to discover the truth.

parts.title: Princess Principal Crown Handler: Chapter 2
parts.original_title: プリンセス・プリンシパル Crown Handler 第2章
parts.overview: After an attempt on King Richard’s life, assassins target Princess Mary, the next in line to the throne. Team White Pigeon must protect her while locating deadly Cavorite bombs — a tough feat when Ange is Princess Mary’s sister in disguise.

parts.title: Princess Principal Crown Handler: Chapter 3
parts.original_title: プリンセス・プリンシパル Crown Handler 第3章
parts.overview: While the funeral of the assassinated Prince Edward, who was the first in line to succeed the throne, is being held, the nobles of the Kingdom of Albion discuss topics such as whether the second-in-line Princess Mary or the third-in-line Duke of Arkham, Prince Richard, will succeed the throne, and how the Duke of Normandy will act.

parts.title: Kuiba
parts.overview: In this mystifying world, a creature is reborn every 333 years. This creature is Kuiba. The creature is an exploitation of a loophole in the Universe. It brings disaster to all each time it appears. To keep Kuiba from returning, deities and people from the entire world team up and destroy the creature every 333 years, which is known as "The Revival of Kuiba". In the year 1664, Kuiba's rebirth, the extermination of Kuiba failed, as Kuiba was able to fall into the body of Manji. Manji, a young boy, has no idea of Kuiba being inside of him. Due to the failed extermination, the people of earth recruit for an army to defeat Kuiba. Manji and his Master are eager to prove themselves to be top notch warriors, so they enlist in the army to fight Kuiba. As they prepare for battle against Kuiba, Manji and Master man not only encounter a variety of dynamic characters, but also encounter a beast which will prove if they are ready for the challenges ahead that lay ahead.

parts.title: Kuiba 2
parts.overview: Manji and Master Man board a warship bound headed to Maelstrom Island. Meanwhile, on Maelstrom Island, Kuiba's fiercest lieutenants are preparing for battle. Manji soon faces conflicts between his father, the gods, and Kuiba's lieutenants.

parts.title: Kuiba III
parts.overview: Before he can get close to the real enemy, Manji faces challenges from two powerful opponents : Da Cang - a master of using body pulse, and Hai Wen Xiang - a sea witch who is extremely loyal to Kuiba. When Manji is unwillingly engaged in an intense battle with Hai Wen Xiang. Kuiba reveals its mysterious appearance.

parts.title: Michelin Stars: Tales from the Kitchen
parts.overview: At a moment in time, when humanity is obsessed with food - photographing every dish, worshipping cooks and flaunting trophy meals on social media, this documentary goes under the surface and offers an in-depth, honest and relevant view into the world and every day of Michelin chefs and restaurants. Telling tales from a grand menu of culinary temples as well as digging into the greatness and flaws of Guide Michelin in this golden age of gastronomy. Because we share a great love for the industry that also includes a realistic understanding of things behind the picturesque scenes of the--perhaps--greatest, most creative and dynamic industry in the world.

parts.title: Michelin Stars II – Nordic by Nature
parts.original_title: Michelin Stars II – Nordic by Nature
parts.overview: The Faroe Islands are an ancient microcosmos of exciting products, Nordic history, tales, 37 words for fog and even more for fermentation, a thriving seafood industry, ravishing waterfalls, eccentric personalities, a native tongue, and the culinary pearl: KOKS. How is it possible to run a top restaurant like this at the end of the world? Prior to covid-19, people took immense detours to dine at this eatery serving food sourced from just 500 square miles of produce, in a rugged terrain and where the climate is subpolar, windy, wet, cloudy, and cold, with average temperatures close to freezing throughout the year, everlasting light in summer and a scorching darkness all through winter. In Nordic by Nature we dive into the poetic mind of young Faroese chef Poul Andrias Ziska, and seek to find the traditions, history and distinctive ancient practices that lie beneath the world's most remote fine dining experience.

1203290.name: Kamikaze Love Collection
1203290.overview: Victoria is a beautiful, young woman just beginning to succeed in L.A. as a jewelry designer. Then she meets Jack, a handsome and enormously rich entrepreneur... and her life changes forever. He courts her with a combination of charm and sensuality that she finds irresistible. Everything is better and more intense than she has ever experienced - the romance, the sex, the orgasms, everything. No matter what he asks, she will do it to please him. She doesn't see herself as a victim. She is a willing co-conspirator. He continues to push the erotic envelope further and further, plunging Victoria into a world of sexuality that she never dreamed existed. Finally, it gets too much for her and that begins a dark, downward spiral that almost costs Victoria her sanity and her life. She is able to escape by the skin of her teeth and then decides to tell her story as a cautionary tale for other women who may face this same kind of thrilling but dangerous total sexual possession.

parts.title: Kamikaze Love Volume 1 - Craving Intensity
parts.overview: Victoria is a beautiful, young woman just beginning to succeed in L.A. as a jewelry designer. Then she meets Jack, a handsome and enormously rich entrepreneur... and her life changes forever. He courts her with a combination of charm and sensuality that she finds irresistible. Everything is better and more intense than she has ever experienced - the romance, the sex, the orgasms, everything. No matter what he asks, she will do it to please him. She doesn't see herself as a victim. She is a willing co-conspirator. He continues to push the erotic envelope further and further, plunging Victoria into a world of sexuality that she never dreamed existed. Finally, it gets too much for her and that begins a dark, downward spiral that almost costs Victoria her sanity and her life. She is able to escape by the skin of her teeth and then decides to tell her story as a cautionary tale for other women who may face this same kind of thrilling but dangerous total sexual possession.

parts.title: Kamikaze Love Volume 2 - Overwhelming Passion
parts.overview: Part two of SexArt’s erotic classic "Kamikaze Love," directed by Hollywood legend Zalman King. An impressive cast including top stars Elle Alexandra and Malena Morgan makes this dark tale of destructive passion compelling – and highly arousing. It’s the perfect meeting of glamour, intrigue and sex; once seen, never forgotten.

parts.title: Kamikaze Love Volume 3 - Pushing Boundaries
parts.overview: Part three of SexArt’s erotic classic "Kamikaze Love," directed by Hollywood legend Zalman King. An impressive cast including top stars Elle Alexandra and Malena Morgan makes this dark tale of destructive passion compelling – and highly arousing. It’s the perfect meeting of glamour, intrigue and sex; once seen, never forgotten.

parts.title: Kamikaze Love Volume 4 - Exploring Together
parts.overview: Revel in the seductive thrill of part four of SexArt’s erotic classic "Kamikaze Love," directed by Hollywood legend Zalman King. An impressive cast including top stars Elle Alexandra and Malena Morgan makes this dark tale of destructive passion compelling – and highly arousing. It’s the perfect meeting of glamour, intrigue and sex; once seen, never forgotten.

parts.title: Kamikaze Love Volume 5 - Unexpected Pleasure
parts.overview: Immerse yourself in the rollercoaster drama of part five of SexArt’s erotic classic "Kamikaze Love," directed by Hollywood legend Zalman King. An impressive cast including top stars Elle Alexandra and Malena Morgan makes this dark tale of destructive passion compelling – and highly arousing. It’s the perfect meeting of glamour, intrigue and sex; once seen, never forgotten.

parts.title: Kamikaze Love Volume 6 - Dangerous Desires
parts.overview: The steamy conclusion to this rollercoaster drama of part six of SexArt’s erotic classic "Kamikaze Love," directed by Hollywood legend Zalman King. An impressive cast including top stars Elle Alexandra and Malena Morgan makes this dark tale of destructive passion compelling – and highly arousing. It’s the perfect meeting of glamour, intrigue and sex; once seen, never forgotten.

1096561.name: Dave of the Dead Collection
1096561.overview: A collection of CGI animated movies about a delivery zombie and a carnivorous plant.

parts.title: Dave of the Dead
parts.overview: Zombie Dave has worked the fly-thru window at Spacejack's intergalactic fast food restaurant for ten years, and he's seen it all until Count Dracula stiffs Spacejack's on a bill, leaving Dave on the hook for eight space bucks.

parts.title: Dave of the Dead: Deadly Delivery
parts.original_title: Dave of the Dead: Deadly Delivery
parts.overview: With thousands of Spacejacks orders delivered and thousands more to go, well-meaning space zombie Dave and his always-voracious companion Num-Num the carnivorous plant, face their most challenging fast-food delivery ever - to the Grimm Reaper himself. As they race to deliver their order before the 30 space minutes are up the monster duo discovers that an epic destiny awaits them. This Halloween, laugh 'til you coffin with Dave Of The Dead Deadly Delivery.

1192328.name: The Last Padawan Short Films
1192328.overview: In a galaxy torn by the shadows of tyranny, a lone Jedi Padawan finds himself thrust into a perilous quest for the very heart of the Jedi Order. His Jedi Master's dying wish sends him on a journey to uncover the hidden reserve of Kyber Crystals, the sacred and essential components of a Jedi Knight's weapon.

parts.title: The Last Padawan: A Short Star Wars Story
parts.original_title: The Last Padawan: A Short Star Wars Story
parts.overview: A Jedi Padawan is on the run. By his Jedi Master's last request he must find the Order's reserve of the Kyber Crystals. The key component to creating the weapon of a Jedi Knight.

parts.title: The Last Padawan II: A Short Star Wars Story
parts.original_title: The Last Padawan II: A Short Star Wars Story
parts.overview: The Last Padawan is back with The Evil Empire hot on his heels. While seeking help from the local Rebels The Padawan will have to make a choice: Will he reveal himself and save the people or hide and save the Jedi order.

971395.name: Pluto it is no Longer a Planet Collection
971395.overview: In Revolted toys from Pluto that is no longer a planet, Pluto invades Earth sending toys on the attack, after the destruction, in Pluto Definitely it is no Longer a Planet, a survivor will seek revenge.

parts.title: Revolted toys from Pluto that is no longer a planet
parts.original_title: Brinquedos revoltados de Plutão que não é mais planeta
parts.overview: The creators of The Incredibly Distracted Killer, Jonathan Rodrigues and Eduardo Carvalho present their new short. A lonely child finds a toy box of unknown origin and strange things happening tomorrow.

parts.title: Pluto Definitively it is no Longer a Planet
parts.original_title: Plutão Definitivamente não é mais Planeta
parts.overview: He watched his world crumble when Pluto sent an attack in the form of toys to devastate our planet, now he wanders the broken streets alone, but an unexpected accident will be his chance for revenge and a fresh start.

936268.name: Aileen Wuornos Collection
936268.overview: Films a part of the sensationalized Aileen Wuornos 'canon'. Aileen Wuornos: American Boogeywoman (2021) is a sequel to Monster (2003), as evidenced by Wikipedia.

parts.title: Monster
parts.overview: An emotionally scarred highway drifter shoots a sadistic trick who rapes her, and ultimately becomes America's first female serial killer.

parts.title: Aileen Wuornos: American Boogeywoman
parts.overview: Based on Aileen Wuornos’s early life, this Is the true story of  America’s most notorious female serial killer, who went on a killing spree in Florida in 1989 and 1990. What few people know, is that back in 1976 a young and beautiful Aileen Wuornos arrived in Florida searching for a new life that would help her escape her tragic past, married a wealthy Yacht Club President and had the chance to start again as part of Florida’s high society….or did she?

980782.name: The Legend of Jack and Jill Collection
980782.overview: The Legend of Jack and Jill Collection

parts.title: Jack and Jill
parts.overview: A horror retelling of the nursery rhyme Jack and Jill. A group of friends grieving a recent loss meet up with one another only to discover they are being hunted by Jack and Jill.

parts.title: Jack And Jill: The Hills of Hell
parts.original_title: Jack And Jill: The Hills of Hell
parts.overview: After searching for her missing daughter, a lady will discover the deadly legend behind the famous Nursery Rhyme.

parts.title: Jack and Jill 3
parts.overview: 10 years after the last vicious killings on the hill, Jack and Jill are back to slaughter the cast and crew of a live streaming internet show who are looking to uncover the secrets of the legend.

parts.title: The Vengeance
parts.overview: The story of Morsay and Zehef, two French rappers.

parts.title: The Vengeance II
parts.overview: Sequel of The Vengeance

parts.title: The Vengance 3
parts.overview: End of La Vengeance Trilogy

parts.title: Black Crow 1
parts.overview: Kazuki works as a rookie host at a host club. One of his regular customers is Mai, but she disappears. Mai has a tab of 6 million yen with the host club. The bar owner orders Kazuki to find Mai within a week or Kazuki will have to pay back her debt. Kazuki turns to problem-solving office Kurogarasu. There, Kuroto, Yuya and Hina are hired by Kazuki to find Mai and he offers them 3 million yen.

parts.title: Black Crow 2
parts.overview: One day, Chizuru (Nana Asakawa) and Mioto (Aino Kuribayashi) enters problem-solving office Kurogarasu. The two girls look naive, but Chizuru is a leader of a enjo kosai group. Their group makes money by having young girls date older men for money. Thugs are threatening Chizuru for money. Chizuru pays 2.5 million yen to the problem-solving office Kurogarasu for their help. Kuroto (Tsubasa Sakiyama), Yuya (Keisuke Ueda) and Hina (Moga Mogami) take the case and begin to investigate the thugs, but they find something unexpected.

850336.name: Masquerade Hotel Collection
850336.overview: Stories about a Japanese police as an undercover in a Tokyo Hotel working closely with a staff from the hotel to solve murder threats.

parts.title: Masquerade Hotel
parts.original_title: マスカレード・ホテル
parts.overview: Three murder cases take place in Tokyo. Numbers are left at the murder scenes, possibly hinting at where the next murder will take place. An investigation begins of the serial killer and Detective Kosuke Nitta works on the case. He believes the next murder will take place at Hotel Koruteshia Tokyo. To catch the killer, Kosuke Nitta goes undercover and begins working at the front desk of the hotel.  Naomi Yamagishi works at the front desk of Hotel Koruteshia Tokyo. She is selected to train Kosuke Nitta for his front desk job, but they can't get along. Kosuke Nitta is focused on catching the killer, but Naomi Yamagishi prioritizes the safety of the guests. As they begin to understand each others differences, they also begin to build a trust between each other. Who is the murderer?

parts.title: Masquerade Night
parts.original_title: マスカレード・ナイト
parts.overview: An anonymous letter is delivered to the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department. The letter states that a criminal of a murder case will appear at the countdown party Masquerade Night that will be held at Hotel Cortesia Tokyo. Detective Kosuke Nitta must go undercover and work again at the Hotel Cortesia Tokyo. There, he meets Naomi Yamagishi, who works as a concierge. Without any information about the criminal, except that the person will be in attendance, Detective Kosuke Nitta works feverishly to find the criminal among the 500 attendees.

parts.title: Free! the Final Stroke The First Volume
parts.original_title: 劇場版 Free!–the Final Stroke– 前編
parts.overview: Haruka Nanase's new stage to take on the world is Sydney – a place he once visited, a place of dreams. One day, while taking a short break before his departure, Haruka coincidentally runs into a swimmer that competed at the All Japan National Championships, andi s burning for a challenge.  With the feelings of his friends whom he swam together brimming in his heart, Haruka steps forward into a brand new world. What awaits him is the world champion, Albert Volandel. The swimmers mentally prepare themselves for the competition in Syndey.  What will they fell and what will they swim for as they compete for a place at the top of the world? Their intense battle with the water begins here!

parts.title: Free! the Final Stroke The Second Volume
parts.original_title: 劇場版 Free!–the Final Stroke– 後編
parts.overview: After his first appearance on the competitive world stage, Haruka was overwhelmed by Albert’s swimming and lost his way. “What are you swimming for?” His reason to swim and what the water means to him are called into question. The question has trapped Haruka, and he struggles to find the answer on his own.

892613.name: Princess Cut Collection
892613.overview: A series of faith-based romance films.

parts.title: Princess Cut
parts.overview: A lifelong Carolina farm girl, now in her early 20's, Grace has dreamed all her life of the day when "Mr. Right" slips a Princess Cut diamond on her finger and swears to love her forever. Tonight may be that night as Stewart has something special planned after 15 months together! But when things don't go as planned, and romance crashes down around her, it launches her on a quest, aided by her father, to understand what it means to truly love another person. Will Grace finally discover love or ruin her chances for happiness forever?

parts.title: Princess Cut 2: Hearts on Fire
parts.overview: After years of trying to start a family, Robert and Lauren Anderson are excited to be pregnant. They share the news with Robert's sister Grace who runs a small clinic with her husband Clint. Despite Grace's reassurances and motherly example, Lauren fears she can't maintain her athletic boutique and adequately raise a family. Modest success buoys her hopes, until the storms of life converge.

parts.title: Princess Cut 3: Beauty from Ashes
parts.overview: A down-on-her-luck waitress witnesses a domestic disturbance and develops an unexpected relationship with the policeman investigating the case.

parts.title: Out of My League
parts.overview: Marta may be an orphan, and she may be affected by a lethal illness, yet she is the most positive person one can meet. She wants a boy to fall for her. Not any boy - the most handsome of them all. One day, she may have found her match.

parts.title: Still Out of My League
parts.overview: After breaking up with her dreamboat, Marta finds love with an artist. But life throws a few twists into the mix for the ailing woman and her friends.

parts.title: Forever Out of My League
parts.overview: Marta may be an orphan, and she may be affected by a lethal illness, yet she is the most positive person one can meet. She wants a boy to fall for her. Not any boy - the most handsome of them all. One day, she may have found her match.

726871.name: Dune Collection
726871.overview: The saga of Paul Atreides and his rise to power on the deadly planet Arrakis.

parts.title: Dune
parts.overview: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people. As malevolent forces explode into conflict over the planet's exclusive supply of the most precious resource in existence-a commodity capable of unlocking humanity's greatest potential-only those who can conquer their fear will survive.

parts.title: Dune: Part Two
parts.overview: Follow the mythic journey of Paul Atreides as he unites with Chani and the Fremen while on a path of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the known universe, Paul endeavors to prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

parts.title: Dune Messiah
parts.overview: The third entry in the Dune film series, adapted from Dune Messiah, the second in Frank Herbert's series of six novels.

993199.name: Kau & Dia Collection
993199.overview: Kau & Dia is a 2021 Indonesian romantic drama film directed by Ivan Bandhito, and starring Anneth Delliecia, Zara Leola, and Ari Irham.  The sequel was released on July 1, 2022.

parts.title: Kau & Dia
parts.overview: Zara and Anneth, two teenagers from different families, grow up best friends and promise to always protect each other. Naldo's presence makes their friendship tested with teenage love choices. Will Zara and Anneth preserve their friendship for the sake of love?

parts.title: Kau & Dia 2
parts.overview: Zara, Naldo, and Annette. The love triangle story and their friendship continues again. This time there was a cool man named Bryan who was present among them.

869715.name: John Bronco Collection
869715.overview: A collection of mocumentaries about the legendary Ford Bronco pitchman.

parts.title: John Bronco
parts.overview: The unbelievable story of the rise, fall and ultimate redemption of the legendary pitchman for the Ford Bronco.

parts.title: John Bronco Rides Again
parts.overview: When Ford Motor Company archivist Daniel Stacks discovers that John Bronco, the greatest pitchman of all time, does not have a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame, he must find John and convince him to get back in the saddle again.

1200974.name: Yodonna Collection
1200974.overview: The Mashin Sentai Kiramager spin-off, Yodonna, in one collection.

parts.title: Mashin Sentai Kiramager Spin-Off: Yodonna
parts.overview: Kiramager special focusing on the characters of Yodonna and Mizuki Kakihara

parts.title: Mashin Sentai Kiramager Spin-Off: Yodonna 2
parts.overview: A sequel to Mashin Sentai Kiramager Spin-Off: Yodonna.

parts.title: Mashin Sentai Kiramager Spin-Off: Yodonna 3: Yodonna's Valentine
parts.original_title: ヨドンナ3 ヨドンナのバレンタイン
parts.overview: In the special, Yodonna is given an opportunity to revive as a human on the condition she learn about the emotion of love on Valentine's Day.

parts.title: Mashin Sentai Kiramager Spin-Off: Yodonna THE FINAL
parts.overview: The final Yodonna special, Yodonna, who is now living in the human world after her revival, accidentally ends up working with a group of female bank robbers.

parts.title: The In-Laws
parts.overview: Is a party after a canceled wedding a recipe for disaster? It is. And what a disaster it is! Two families differ in everything - origin, status, wallet content, taste. The parents of the groom and bride are initially shocked. What did such a thing happen? Who was at fault? What about the wedding party? Should they welcome the guests? Play music? Pour the vodka? Who will cut the cake? From word to word, polite smiles turn into public washing of dirt. And finally a real bomb goes off... And in the meantime, the wedding party turns into a wild party. And no one is bothered by the absence of the newlyweds.

parts.title: The In-Laws 2
parts.overview: Weronika and Łukasz – a would-be bride and groom from the first film – decide to give themselves a second chance and invite their family to the wedding and the reception, which will take place in a seaside town. Among the invited guests, the viewers will recognise well-known characters, including: Wanda and Tadeusz  with their dog, Mirelka, and also a divorcee, Małgorzata, accompanied by… her much younger partner, Jan , and her mother. The sea, drinks and nude sunbathers make the family members of the bride and groom more open and ready to shed their masks.

parts.title: CarousHELL
parts.overview: Duke hates his job. He has to let kids climb on his back and ride him for hours every single day. But one brat finally pushed him too far. Duke has broken free of his ride and is on a bloody rampage of revenge. He's going to murder that kid and anyone that gets in his way.

parts.title: CarousHELL The 2nd
parts.overview: Duke has always wondered about his purpose in life. Who he was, what he was meant to do. He just found out that he's a father. At the same time, those who created Duke years ago have found him.  Now Duke has to deal with fatherhood AND dark magic wielding Nazis.

parts.title: CarousHELL 3
parts.overview: The trilogy conclusion and ending to the character arc Duke has been on since 2016.

888484.name: Time Is Up Collection
888484.overview: A collection of romantic dramas set in Italy between Vivien and Roy.

parts.title: Time Is Up
parts.overview: Vivien, an accomplished student with a passion for physics, and Roy, a troubled young man, are involved in an accident that forces them to reclaim their lives one minute at the time.

parts.title: Game of Love
parts.overview: Follows Vivien and Roy as their love story continues and leads them to Roy’s childhood home in Sicily to prepare for the sale of the family estate. During the visit, a mysterious woman arrives and befriends Vivien, much to Roy’s displeasure. Tensions build and lines are crossed as secrets from Roy’s past force the couple to face aspects of their relationship they did not know existed.

303872.name: Little Nicholas Trilogy
303872.overview: Movies based on the French-language comic books series created by René Goscinny.

parts.title: Little Nicholas
parts.overview: Nicolas has a happy existence, parents who love him, a great group of friends with whom he has great fun, and all he wants is that nothing changes. However, one day, he overhears a conversation that leads him to believe that his life might change forever, his mother is pregnant! He panics and envisions the worst.

parts.title: Nicholas on Holiday
parts.overview: It's the end of the school year. The long-awaited moment of the holidays is arrive. The little Nicolas, her parents and Grandma take the road towards the sea, and settle in for some time at the Hotel Beau-Rivage.

parts.title: Little Nicholas' Treasure
parts.overview: In the peaceful world of Little Nicholas, there is Daddy, Mommy, the school, but above all, his band of friends. They are called The Invincibles, but above all they are inseparable. At least they think so. But when Dad gets a promotion and announces that the family is moving to the south of France, Nicolas' world falls apart. How can he imagine life without his best friends?

parts.title: Out of the City
parts.overview: A computer programmer and his son are going out of the city for vacation.

parts.title: To the Woods
parts.overview: Honza Marak has long since abandoned a career in IT and has bought a cottage on the outskirts of a small village, where he’s settled in with his wife Marketa, daughter Anyna and son Sayen. He works in the woods as a forest labourer repairing roads and enclosures, cutting wood to sell and assisting the foresters. Marketa earns a living as a masseuse and alternative healer, making use of various mind-altering plants and mushrooms, which leads to conflict with the old inhabitants and eventually with drug enforcement. Daughter Anyna attends a distant school where her grades deteriorate as she wanders the woods learning from nature rather than from her textbooks.

parts.title: Way Home
parts.overview: With his father's memory waning, a struggling forester must confront the troubling reality about his livelihood and his family's future.

858719.name: Harry & Meghan Collection (Lifetime)
858719.overview: This is a collection of all of Lifetime's made-for-TV Harry and Meghan movies.

parts.title: Harry & Meghan: A Royal Romance
parts.overview: Examine the history of Prince Harry and Meghan Markle from the moment they met after being set up by friends, through their initial courtship when they were able to keep their romance under wraps, and ultimately the intense global media attention surrounding their relationship and Meghan’s life as a divorced American actress.

parts.title: Harry & Meghan: Becoming Royal
parts.overview: The continuing love story of newlyweds Prince Harry and American actress Meghan Markle during their first year of marriage.

parts.title: Harry and Meghan: Escaping the Palace
parts.original_title: Harry and Meghan: Escaping the Palace
parts.overview: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex are taking on the British monarchy in the third installment in Lifetime’s movie trilogy about the royal couple. The film explores what really happened inside the palace that drove Harry and Meghan to leave everything behind in order to make a future for themselves and their son Archie.

898492.name: Life of Crime Collection
898492.overview: A series of documentaries featuring an unfiltered look at three friends from Newark and their experiences with drug addiction, prison and rehab over nearly 40 years.

parts.title: One Year in a Life of Crime
parts.original_title: One Year in a Life of Crime
parts.overview: Their job is stealing, their lives a cruel dead end. Director Jon Alpert takes his cameras undercover for this hard-hitting look at men who live by theft and suffer addiction. Focusing on a year in the lives of three professional criminals, this gritty profile—which includes hidden-camera footage of actual thefts—exposes the "petty" crimes that are paralyzing America.

parts.title: Life of Crime 2
parts.overview: This follow-up to the 1989 documentary ONE YEAR IN A LIFE OF CRIME revisits three of the original subjects in New Jersey during a five-year period in the 1990s. We share in their triumphs and setbacks as they navigate lives of poverty, drug abuse, AIDS, and petty crime.

parts.title: Life of Crime: 1984-2020
parts.overview: An intimate documentary that looks at the vicious cycles of drug addiction and street crime in one of the roughest parts of New Jersey.

950672.name: Kamen Rider Revice Collection
950672.overview: Movies featuring Kamen Rider Revice from the eponymous TV series.

parts.title: Kamen Rider Revice The Movie: Battle Familia
parts.original_title: 劇場版 仮面ライダーリバイス バトルファミリア
parts.overview: The Igarashi siblings travel to the forbidden Area 666 to rescue airjacking victims (including their parents!) from the dangerous criminal known as Azuma, who wishes to judge the fate of humanity himself.

parts.title: Kamen Rider: Beyond Generations
parts.original_title: 仮面ライダー ビヨンド・ジェネレーションズ
parts.overview: Ikki, Touma, and their allies fight against a Devil with ties to Shocker while attempting to help a Kamen Rider from the future reconcile with his now elderly son.

parts.title: Revice Forward: Kamen Rider Live & Evil & Demons
parts.original_title: リバイスForward 仮面ライダーライブ&エビル&デモンズ
parts.overview: Devils that lurk within humans, and family that is deemed irreplaceable to humans. With these two words, a new story in which familiar characters clash with passion.  After a long battle, the Igarashi Family and their friends have finally achieved peace. However... a new threat that transcends Giff, the progenitor of the demons, has appeared.

parts.title: Kamen Rider Revice: Final Stage
parts.original_title: 仮面ライダーリバイス ファイナルステージ＆番組キャストトークショー
parts.overview: Taking place after the final episode, the Iggarashi Family and FENIX reunite for one last battle against Giff and the Deadmans.

parts.title: Kamen Rider Revice: Special Event
parts.original_title: 仮面ライダーリバイス スペシャルイベント
parts.overview: A special stage show for Kamen Rider Revice. The stage show was performed live on May 4-5, 2022.

parts.title: Kamen Rider Revice: Koala VS Kangaroo!! Crying Out Love Smack in the Center of a Wedding?!
parts.original_title: てれびくん超バトルDVD 仮面ライダーリバイス コアラVSカンガルー！！結婚式のチューしんで愛をさけぶ！？
parts.overview: A Hyper Battle DVD movie based on Kamen Rider Revice.

parts.title: Revice Legacy: Kamen Rider Vail
parts.original_title: リバイスレガシー 仮面ライダーベイル
parts.overview: Before the birth of the Igarashi children... A dying and seriously injured man was brought to the scientific research organization Noah. The man, Junpei Shiranami was transplanted with Giff's cells into the heart by Masumi Karizaki and survived. He was forced to become the strongest Devil hunter and given the Vail Driver. Junpei, whose parents were killed by the red Devil, becomes Kamen Rider Vail with revenge on his mind, continuing to fight the Devil...  A movie-length cut of the TTFC Mini-series

parts.title: Kamen Rider Revice The Movie Spin-Off: Birth of Chimera
parts.original_title: 『劇場版 仮面ライダーリバイス』スピンオフ配信ドラマ『Birth of Chimera』
parts.overview: The origin story of Nozomu Otani, a young man who inherits the powers of Kamen Rider Chimera from his friend Ryu Mukai. This special serves as a prequel to the events of Kamen Rider Revice: Battle Familia.

parts.title: Kamen Rider Revice: Say Hello to the Secondary Rider!
parts.original_title: てれびくん超（ハイパー）バトルDVD 仮面ライダーリバイス 2号ライダーはじめました♪
parts.overview: When a Karizaki from a parallel Earth arrives and asks for the Riders' help, Daiji, Kagerou, Hiromi and Vice argue which of them is Ikki's secondary rider.

parts.title: Kamen Rider Revice: Hiromi's Memory Movie
parts.original_title: 仮面ライダーリバイス ヒロミ思い出ムービー
parts.overview: During the events of Kamen Rider Revice, the amnesiac Hiromi Kadota's friends make a movie to help him regain his lost enemies.

parts.title: Kamen Rider Revice: Transformation Lessons
parts.original_title: 仮面ライダーリバイス変身講座
parts.overview: A short movie which shows transformation of Kamen Rider Revi and Vice.

940926.name: Amityville Scarecrow Collection
940926.overview: A collection of films focused on a haunted summer camp.

parts.title: Amityville Scarecrow
parts.overview: A summer camp that is about to open to unwitting guests. However, there is something evil that lurks on the land.

parts.title: Amityville Scarecrow 2
parts.overview: It has been a year since the events of the first movie, and the survivors are about to reopen the camp.. However, something sinister lurks.. And all is not what it seems.

286177.name: Rise of the Footsoldier Collection
286177.overview: Rise of the Footsoldier is a British crime film released on 7 September 2007. The third production from BAFTA Award-nominated director Julian Gilbey, it is a gangster film based on the true story of the Rettendon murders and the autobiography of Carlton Leach, a football hooligan of the infamous Inter City Firm (ICF) who became a powerful figure of the English underworld. The sequel Rise Of The Footsoldier Part II followed in 2015 and the prequel, Rise of the Footsoldier 3: The Beginning, came in 2017

parts.title: Rise of the Footsoldier
parts.overview: Rise of the Footsoldier follows the inexorable rise of Carlton Leach from one of the most feared generals of the football terraces to becoming a member of a notorious gang of criminals who rampaged their way through London and Essex in the late eighties and early nineties.

parts.title: Rise of the Footsoldier: Part II
parts.original_title: Rise of the Footsoldier: Part II
parts.overview: On the 6th December 1995, three Essex gang members were brutally murdered in cold blood. It’s now early 1997 and whoever killed the three men have yet to be brought to justice. An associate of the men, still mourning the loss of his friends, is convinced that it’s only a matter of time before he’s next. For him, the only way out is to go back in and work his way back up the criminal ladder. The higher he gets, the more violent the jobs become, his quest for power turning into an obsession. With life and family on the line can he hold his nerve together one last time in order to get out alive?

parts.title: Rise of the Footsoldier 3: The Pat Tate Story
parts.original_title: Rise of the Footsoldier 3: The Pat Tate Story
parts.overview: Notorious gangster, Pat Tate, rises through the ranks of Essex's criminal underworld. A prequel to the 'Rise of the Footsoldier' franchise.

parts.title: Rise of the Footsoldier 4: Marbella
parts.overview: Fresh out of prison, Pat Tate steps right back into his Essex nightclub. But still disgruntled, he soon sets out to Marbelle to revenge those that put him away for five years. While in Spain, Pat cannot turn away from the opportunity to score the biggest drug deal of his life. All he needs is for his Essex pals Tony and Craig to deliver the cash to Marbella to close the deal. But Craig, useless as ever, turns a simple plane trip to a massive road trip packed with trickery and danger. And Tony is more worried about making it back to England as he has promised to support his best friend Nigel Benn at the boxing match of his life. While waiting in Marbella, Pat proceeds with the violent revenge he has craved for years. Revenges are made and Tony and Carlton walk Nigel Benn out to what turns out to be one of the most tragic fights in history. But the drugs they bring back seems to be a bad batch and cause them more trouble than they have ever anticipated before.

parts.title: Rise of the Footsoldier: Origins
parts.overview: A brutal account of how real-life, hard-as-nails Falklands War veteran Tony Tucker came to be involved in one of the most notorious gangland murders in British history.

parts.title: Rise of the Footsoldier: Vengeance
parts.overview: Pat Tate embarks on a rampage to avenge his loyal and trusted footsoldier's violent death, venturing beyond his comfort zone of Essex into the dark side of 90s Soho to track down the villain responsible. Set to execute his revenge, Tate will stop at nothing even as the world around him starts to explode.

848922.name: The Tomorrow War Collection
848922.overview: A collection of science fiction action films starring Chris Pratt as a ex-soldier recruited to fight in a future war.

parts.title: The Tomorrow War
parts.overview: The world is stunned when a group of time travelers arrive from the year 2051 to deliver an urgent message: Thirty years in the future, mankind is losing a global war against a deadly alien species. The only hope for survival is for soldiers and civilians from the present to be transported to the future and join the fight. Among those recruited is high school teacher and family man Dan Forester. Determined to save the world for his young daughter, Dan teams up with a brilliant scientist and his estranged father in a desperate quest to rewrite the fate of the planet.

parts.title: The Tomorrow War 2
parts.overview: Sequel to The Tomorrow War (2021).

531143.name: Help, I Shrunk My...
531143.overview: Help, I Shrunk My... German Movie Series

parts.title: Help, I Shrunk My Parents
parts.original_title: Hilfe, ich hab meine Eltern geschrumpft
parts.overview: Felix's school is haunted again, only this time it's not the benevolent spirit of school founder Otto Leonhard and the nuisance he caused, but the hated and long-since dead Director Hulda Stingbeard. A coincidence causes the former shrunken and skeletonized school principle to rise again. When she manages to return to real life she almost defeats Otto Leonhard, manages to shrink Dr. Schmitt-Gössenwein and Felix' parents, and takes over the school. It takes Felix, Ella and their gang to set the levers in motion to save the school and bring Dr. Schmitt-Gössenwein and his parents back to their original size again.

parts.title: Help, I Shrunk My Teacher
parts.original_title: Hilfe, ich hab meine Lehrerin geschrumpft
parts.overview: Already having a hard time adjusting at his new school, things take a turn for the bizarre for eleven year old Felix when he accidentally shrinks his strict principal to only fifteen centimetres in height!

parts.title: Help, I Shrunk My Friends
parts.original_title: Hilfe, ich hab meine Freunde geschrumpft
parts.overview: Melanie is a new pupil at the Otto Leonhard High School, and Felix takes a real shine to this newbie, much to the annoyance of Ella and Felix’s gang. They believe that Melanie is responsible for a number of small thefts that have been happening at the school since she arrived. Events take a drastic turn when the class goes on a school trip. When Felix’s friends almost mess up his date with Melanie, he shrinks them spontaneously to a tenth of their size. Just for a short time, he thinks to himself. But once Melanie has left, the magic ball to restoring his friends to their proper size has also disappeared. Is Melanie behind the thefts after all? In the process, Felix not only has to shrink himself, he also must confess his love to Melanie and admit his mistakes to his friends.

parts.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
parts.original_title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
parts.overview: Shang-Chi must confront the past he thought he left behind when he is drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.

parts.title: Untitled Shang-Chi Sequel
parts.overview: Sequel to the 2021 film “Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings”.

1002637.name: Killer Poop Collection
1002637.overview: The misadventures of Killer Poop, he's brown, he's loose, and he comes from you!

parts.title: Killer Poop
parts.overview: Killer Poop, he's Brown, he's loose, and he comes from you!

parts.title: Killer Poop 2: Amityville Poo
parts.overview: The backstory of the Killer Poop of how he became who he is and where he came from as he kills anyone he runs into.

parts.title: Killer Poop 3: Night of the Living Poop
parts.original_title: Killer Poop 3: Night of the Living Poop
parts.overview: Zombies have come to life, past victims of the Killer Poop and when the zombies poop, well that poop is not your average day dump. It's zombified.

1243369.name: China Cove Memoirs
1243369.overview: A series of films detailing the exploits of two ne'er-do-wells in a sleepy beach community in southern California.

parts.title: Endless Bummer
parts.overview: A surf movie where no one catches a wave, no one gets laid, and they all eat shit.

parts.title: Here's One To Swim To
parts.overview: Moose and Dan become heroin addicts

parts.title: Consider the Oyster
parts.overview: Moose and Dan find themselves in limbo after overdosing on heroin

parts.title: Malibu Chess
parts.overview: Moose and Dan go to rehab.

parts.title: Camp Fez
parts.overview: Moose and Dan get out of dodge after accidentally killing a baby.

1172972.name: Yonatan barak specials
1172972.overview: Stand up specials by Yonatan Barak

parts.title: Yonatan Barak: Sweet And Tasty
parts.overview: Yonatan Barak with a Stand-up comedy special about how a drug-induced trip to Amsterdam made him quit smoking cigarettes.

parts.title: Yonatan Barak: the real thing
parts.overview: A stand up special by Yonatan Barak

parts.title: Yonatan Barak: Psychopath
parts.overview: The third stand up special of the comedian Yonatan Barak

parts.title: Yonatan Barak: wet flip flops
parts.overview: A stand up special about the sexual act called "wet flip flops"

parts.title: Yonatan Barak: unjustified hatred
parts.overview: A stand up special by Yonatan barak

parts.title: Yonatan Barak: fake news
parts.overview: A stand up special by Yonatan barak

parts.title: FUKUYAMA MASAHARU WE'RE BROS. TOUR 2014 HUMAN
parts.original_title: FUKUYAMA MASAHARU WE'RE BROS. TOUR 2014 HUMAN

parts.title: WE'RE BROS. TOUR '94 LIVE ON AND ON
parts.original_title: WE'RE BROS. TOUR '94 LIVE ON AND ON

parts.title: FUKUYAMA MASAHARU WE'RE BROS. TOUR 2014 in ASIA
parts.original_title: FUKUYAMA MASAHARU WE'RE BROS. TOUR 2014 in ASIA

parts.title: FUKUYAMA MASAHARU WE'RE BROS. TOUR 2011 THE LIVE BANG !!
parts.original_title: FUKUYAMA MASAHARU WE'RE BROS. TOUR 2011 THE LIVE BANG !!

parts.title: FUKUYAMA MASAHARU 15th ANNIVERSARY WE'RE BROS. FREEDOM TOUR 2005 〜風〜
parts.original_title: FUKUYAMA MASAHARU 15th ANNIVERSARY WE'RE BROS. FREEDOM TOUR 2005 〜風〜

parts.title: FUKUYAMA MASAHARU WE'RE BROS. TOUR 2007 「十七年モノ」
parts.original_title: FUKUYAMA MASAHARU WE'RE BROS. TOUR 2007 「十七年モノ」

parts.title: FUKUYAMA MASAHARU 20TH ANNIVERSARY WE'RE BROS. TOUR 2009 道標
parts.original_title: FUKUYAMA MASAHARU 20TH ANNIVERSARY WE'RE BROS. TOUR 2009 道標

parts.title: FUKUYAMA MASAHARU WE'RE BROS. TOUR 2021-2022 “Promise for the Future”
parts.original_title: FUKUYAMA MASAHARU WE'RE BROS. TOUR 2021-2022 “Promise for the Future”

parts.title: WE’RE BROS. TOUR 2024 Flowers and Bees, Tears and Music.

1142778.name: Time for Me to Come Home Collection
1142778.overview: Holiday movie series inspired by Blake Shelton's song.

parts.title: Time for Me to Come Home for Christmas
parts.original_title: Time for Me to Come Home for Christmas
parts.overview: Famous musician Heath and small-town girl Cara are each traveling back to Oklahoma for the holidays when they get stranded in Chicago. Despite his fame, she has no idea who he is, but they hit it off—and she even ends up providing some inspiration for the Christmas song he's writing.

parts.title: Time for Them to Come Home for Christmas
parts.original_title: Time for Them to Come Home for Christmas
parts.overview: During the holidays, a woman with amnesia catches a ride with her handsome nurse to investigate the only clue to her identity: a newspaper clipping for a Christmas Festival with a cryptic invitation.

parts.title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas
parts.original_title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas
parts.overview: Four days before Christmas, Elizabeth Athens receives a voicemail from a number she doesn’t recognize. On the message, a man she doesn’t know makes one final plea to the love of his life for a second chance.

parts.title: Time for Us to Come Home for Christmas
parts.original_title: Time for Us to Come Home for Christmas
parts.overview: Five guests are mysteriously invited to an inn to celebrate Christmas. With the help of the owner Ben, Sarah discovers that an event from the past may connect them and change their lives forever.

parts.title: Time for You to Come Home for Christmas
parts.original_title: Time for You to Come Home for Christmas
parts.overview: A recent widow travels with her son to her Virginia hometown for Christmas. On the way they meet a man who is also heading to the same destination. As they continue to spend time together, the pair grows closer.

parts.title: Time for Her to Come Home for Christmas
parts.original_title: Time for Her to Come Home for Christmas
parts.overview: Carly heads to a small town to lead a church choir at Christmastime, facing her first holiday season without her mother. While there, she connects with a man back in town after serving in the Army.

parts.title: Trolls Holiday
parts.overview: When the eternally optimistic Poppy, queen of the Trolls, learns that the Bergens no longer have any holidays on their calendar, she enlists the help of Branch and the rest of the gang on a delightfully quirky mission to fix something that the Bergens don't think is broken.

parts.title: Trolls Holiday in Harmony
parts.overview: Queen Poppy plans the first annual Trolls Kingdom Secret Holiday Gift Swap, but things don't go quite as expected.

961121.name: Eureka Seven Hi-Evolution Collection
961121.overview: As a movie project of the TV animation "Symphonic Psalm Eureka 7", it is the second work after "Symphonic Psalm Eureka 7 Rainbow Full Load" released in 2009. This time, as a three-part series, one work is expected to be released each year from 2017 to 2019, and the third part of the finale is postponed to 2021. In each work, the main characters such as Langton, Ann Wearnai and Eulerika become the central characters of the story. Based on the biggest disaster "Summer of Love" that is not depicted in TV animation, combined with setting changes and the appearance of new characters, including TV animation, games, manga and other eureka 7 series, a simple reconstruction. Painted as a new story that doesn't exist.

parts.title: Eureka Seven Hi-Evolution
parts.original_title: 交響詩篇エウレカセブン ハイエボリューション1
parts.overview: It all begins with the story that was left untold—the earth-shattering incident where Renton's father disappeared. With the mysterious pilot Eureka by his side, only Adroc Thurston could undo his own mistake, sparking the event that changed everything and earned him the title of a hero. Now, ten years later, Eureka lies in critical condition as Renton leaves the crew of the Gekko. But when he finds himself in the care of his father's old friends, he has a choice to make. Either stay with the loving family he's always wanted, or earn the love he seeks.

parts.title: Anemone: Eureka Seven Hi-Evolution
parts.original_title: ANEMONE／交響詩篇エウレカセブン ハイエボリューション
parts.overview: After her father is killed by the deadly coral menace, Anemone vows to have her revenge. But the only way to fight back is from the inside.

parts.title: Eureka: Eureka Seven Hi-Evolution
parts.original_title: EUREKA／交響詩篇エウレカセブン ハイエボリューション
parts.overview: A virtual world in a scab coral (coral-like information life form) created by Eureka. Ten years have passed since the people of the virtual world appeared on this earth with the collapse. As a result of this “great fusion”, human beings in the virtual world call themselves “Green Earth”, and human beings on the old Earth call themselves “Blue Earth”, and various collisions will be repeated under the surface of the water. And Dewey Novak, a high-ranking official of the Green Earth Army, raises up with his colleagues to protect their dignity and finally puts into action a large-scale terrorist program.

1198703.name: Death of England Collection
1198703.overview: The Death of England series explores race and class in contemporary Britain.

parts.title: National Theatre Live: Death of England
parts.original_title: National Theatre Live: Death of England
parts.overview: After the death of his dad, Michael is powerless and angry.  In a state of heartbreak, he confronts the difficult truths about his father’s legacy and the country that shaped him.  At the funeral, unannounced and unprepared, Michael decides it is time to speak.  Rafe Spall (Hedda Gabler) performs this fearless one-person play that asks explosive and enduring questions about identity, race and class in Britain.

parts.title: National Theatre Live: Death of England: Delroy
parts.original_title: National Theatre Live: Death of England: Delroy
parts.overview: Michael Balogun plays Delroy with 'firecracker energy’ in this new work by Clint Dyer and Roy Williams, which explores a Black working class man searching for truth and confronting his relationship with Great Britain.

parts.title: Death of England: Face to Face
parts.original_title: Death of England: Face to Face
parts.overview: Britain is locked down. Michael and Delroy are dealing with issues closer to home. During an explosive afternoon in Delroy's flat, they are forced to confront their relationship with their country – and with each other.

912183.name: The Nine Lives of Christmas Collection
912183.overview: A made-for-television romantic comedy film series by the Hallmark Channel.

parts.title: The Nine Lives of Christmas
parts.overview: With Christmas approaching, a handsome fireman afraid of commitment adopts a stray cat and meets a beautiful veterinary student who challenges his decision to remain a confirmed bachelor.

parts.title: The Nine Kittens of Christmas
parts.overview: Cat lovers Zachary and Marilee are thrown back together at Christmas when they're tasked with finding homes for a litter of adorable kittens.

913392.name: South Park: Post COVID Collection
913392.overview: A series of South Park films depicting a future after the COVID-19 pandemic.

parts.title: South Park: Post COVID
parts.overview: What happened to the children who lived through the Pandemic? Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny survived but will never be the same Post Covid.

parts.title: South Park: Post COVID: The Return of COVID
parts.original_title: South Park: Post COVID: The Return of COVID
parts.overview: If Stan, Kyle and Cartman could just work together, they could go back in time to make sure Covid never happened. But traveling back to the past seems to be the easy answer until they meet Victor Chaos.

847769.name: Drushyam Collection
847769.overview: The stories revolve around Rambabu, a middle-class cable TV operator, and his family.

parts.title: Drushyam
parts.overview: Rambabu, a cable operator, lives with his beloved wife Jyothi and two daughters. One day, his family inadvertently gets involved in a grave crime and he must go to great lengths to protect them.

parts.title: Drushyam 2
parts.overview: 7 years after the events of Drushyam, the family lives with the trauma from that fateful night. A gripping tale of an investigation and a family threatened by it. Will Rambabu be able to protect his family this time?

parts.title: Help! My In-Laws Are Vampires!
parts.overview: A loving young couple discover they're expecting a child, but the man isn't too keen on introducing her girlfriend to his family. Is it because he has a vampire father, a witch mother, a ghostly grandma, and a zombie uncle?

parts.title: A Freaking Wedding!
parts.overview: Vladimiro and Brunilde are grappling with the disappearance of Nando, the head of the family. The sad event brought together the human family of Luna, daughter of Nando, and the monstrous one of her husband Adalberto. Humans, vampires, witches, werewolves and ghosts will find themselves in the throes of a new monstrous marriage...

632907.name: Yowis Ben
632907.overview: Yowis Ben is a StarVision comedy drama film that first hit theaters in 2018. Each sequel is released 1 year later. Until now, it has produced  4 film series and 1 web series. This film tells the life of Bayu, Doni, Nando, and Yayan in building a band from high school.

parts.title: Yowis Ben 2
parts.overview: Recently dumped and facing eviction, a musician pins all his hopes on securing new gigs – but getting his band's groove back won't be so easy.

parts.title: Yowis Ben
parts.overview: To become popular and impress his longtime crush, a nerdy teen forms a pop band with his three best buddies, but it causes a rift in their bromance.

parts.title: Yowis Ben 3
parts.overview: Bayu's life is comfortable, apart from Yowis Ben's growing popularity, Asih, his girlfriend, also always supports Bayu in his every dream. Bayu begins to feel anxious about his future when Nando, his keyboard player, decides to study music abroad, Cak Jon decides to leave Yowis Ben and pursue his love, Mbak Rini, who is engaged to an officer, Captain Arjuna. The situation is made worse by the arrival of Susan, Bayu's ex, who makes them close again without Asih's knowledge. Will Bayu succeed in defending Yowis Ben and maintaining Asih's love, when Bayu is secretly close to Susan again?

parts.title: Yowis Ben Finale
parts.overview: Bayu hurt Cak Jon when he was heartbroken knowing Mbak Rini was going to marry Captain Arjuna. Yowis Ben's fate is at stake. Nando is ready to go to America, and makes Bayu, Doni and Yayan who will soon become fathers of 2 children lose their hopes. When Yowis Ben's family is divided, Bayu is also threatened with breaking up with Asih because of Susan's presence.

parts.title: Mascarpone
parts.overview: Antonio is a 30 year old family man, whose life finds an unexpected twist when he's suddenly dumped by his husband, whom he depends both psychologically and economically: he needs to find a new place to stay, a job and a new purpose in life. Antonio finds a room in an apartment owned by Denis and starts to work in a bakery owned by Luca, while attending pastry school. Through this process he discovers that it was wrong of him to give up his independence for the sake of his relationship in the past.

parts.title: Mascarpone: The Rainbow Cake
parts.overview: Three years have passed, Antonio and Luca are seeing each other for the first time since Denis's death. Luca, who has hit rock bottom after the death of his friend, was lucky enough to meet Tancredi, his current boyfriend, ...while Antonio has focused on his work, so much so that he is now a well-known chef in a pastry shop. It is clear that there is still a special relationship between the two, but Antonio mistakes Luca's affection for something more and does everything he can to ruin his relationship with Tancredi, even though Cristina does not approve of his behavior. Will Antonio learn to leave the past behind in order to fully experience what the future has to offer him?

1015452.name: Queen of the Trap House Collection
1015452.overview: A collection of crime films about a woman who assumes control of her ex-boyfriend's criminal empire.

parts.title: Queen of the Trap House
parts.overview: When Kionna is asked to step in and take control of her jailed boyfriend Tyreek's drug empire, she reluctantly agrees, but her new position as Queen of the Trap House suits her more than expected.

parts.title: Queen of the Trap House 2: Taking the Throne
parts.original_title: Queen of the Trap House 2: Taking the Throne
parts.overview: Kionna has taken full control of her dead boyfriend's drug empire. She has taken the throne to become the official Queen of the Trap House. However, a new man steps into her life causing her to shift focus away from the criminal enterprise. Kionna also begins dealing with new enemies from rival drug gangs to law enforcement. She will now need to maintain control of her personal life as well as her life of crime. Things soon spiral out of control and her empire begins to crumble. Kionna will now need to show everyone what a true Queen does to maintain power.

1025676.name: Worlds Collided - Collection
1025676.overview: As soon as Max enters a portal by accident, his mission is to return to the land where he lives, and for that he will have the help of Zoey and Sparktus, who together will try to get Max back where he came from, before his family and friends do. get even more worried.

parts.title: Worlds Collided - The Season One
parts.overview: As soon as Max enters a portal by accident, his mission is to return to the land where he lives, and for that he will have the help of Zoey and Sparktus, who together will try to get Max back where he came from, before his family and friends do. get even more worried.

parts.title: Worlds Collided - The Season Two - Part One
parts.original_title: Worlds Collided - The Season Two - Part One
parts.overview: After the events of season one, Zoey stays with Max to find out what happened to her family on Earth, but with bad people walking around it won't be an easy task, especially not being able to trust her own friends and maybe not even yourself!  Will Max and Zoey make it through one more step?  New Adventures, New Locations, New Characters, New Enemies, New Locations.

parts.title: Worlds Collided - The Season Two - Part Two
parts.original_title: Worlds Collided - The Season Two - Part Two
parts.overview: After the events of the first season, Zoey stays with Max to find out what happened to her family on Earth, but with bad people walking around it won't be an easy task, especially not being able to trust her own friends and maybe not even yourself!  Will Max and Zoey make it through one more step?  New challenges, New characters, new locations.....  A BIGGER WORLD!!!

1202172.name: Jhimma Collection
1202172.overview: Seven women from different age groups and different socio-cultural backgrounds come together on a vacation with a tour company to London. During the course of this trip these women unfold their journey. This trip turns into an opportunity to mend fences, heal wounds, fall in love with themselves, combat their worst fears and celebrate life.

parts.title: Jhimma
parts.overview: The movie  revolves around a group of seven women travelling to London and discovering themselves.

parts.title: Jhimma 2
parts.overview: To celebrate Indu's 75th birthday, the whole gang goes on a foreign trip as chaos ensues between young women and their mother-in-laws.

1238021.name: Warning Collection
1238021.overview: A Punjabi language Indian action crime thriller film series focusing on revenge.

parts.title: Warning
parts.overview: Set in India, Action Movie Warning is about the story of multiple people that are gangsters and wanting revenge, written and produced by Gippy Grewal, by Humble Motion Pictures, Starring: Gippy Grewal, Prince Kanwaljit, and Dheeraj Kumar.

parts.title: Warning 2
parts.overview: Geja misses assassinating Pamma and ends up in the same jail, intent on finishing the job. A merciless cop's plan to transfer the dangerous prisoners to Rajasthan escalates the situation

parts.title: The Mole Song: Undercover Agent Reiji
parts.original_title: 土竜の唄 潜入捜査官 REIJI
parts.overview: Reiji Kikukawa, who has a strong sense of justice, graduated from the police academy with the lowest score ever. He becomes a police constable, but is suddenly fired by the Police Chief due to "disciplinary" issues. In actuality, the firing is part of a carefully orchestrated plan.  Reiji is ordered to become a "mole," an undercover cop. His target is Shuho Todoroki, the boss of the Sukiyakai gang. The group is the largest crime group in the Kanto area. Masaya Hiura, who works as a young boss of a Sukiyakai affiliated gang likes Reiji. While going through various hardships, Reiji works his way towards Shuho Todoroki.

parts.title: The Mole Song: Hong Kong Capriccio
parts.original_title: 土竜の唄 香港狂騒曲
parts.overview: As undercover cop Reiji takes on a new mission to takedown the Chinese mafia, elite police officer Shinya  moves to arrest Reiji.

parts.title: The Mole Song: FINAL
parts.overview: Reiji's final mission is to prevent the smuggling of 600 billion yen of drugs. For his mission, he gets on luxury passenger ship and he faces his strongest enemy to date.

1013563.name: Osaka Trilogy by Lim Kah Wai

parts.title: New World
parts.overview: Coco, a Beijing modern girl wants to spend a romantic and fancy Christmas vacation in Osaka. However the place where she gets in is Shinsekai ( "New World" in English, is an old neighbourhood located next to south Osaka city's downtown "Minami " area, as known as one of the most poorest and dangerous area in Osaka.)When she arrives there, she starts feeling regret and frustrated by the encounters and the landscapes which are far beyond her expectation. Suddenly she is involved in an incident surrounds a Chinese family there, meanwhile she starts fascinated by Shinsekai through her wondering. In this short and unusual Christmas vacation, Coco discovers a "Japan " she never knows and a "China" that she is not familiar with.

parts.title: Fly Me to Minami
parts.overview: In Fly Me to Minami, Lim’s fourth feature film and follow-up to his Stateless Trilogy, two transnational love stories intersect. The first of these stories is between Sherine, a fashion magazine editor from Hong Kong, and Tatsuya, an amateur photographer in Osaka. The second is between Seol-a, a Korean flight attendant, and Shinsuke, a married Korean-Japanese shopkeeper in Osaka’s Korea Town.

parts.title: Come and Go
parts.original_title: COME & GO カム・アンド・ゴー
parts.overview: Tourists, foreigners and outcasts converge on the streets of Osaka in this sprawling ensemble drama by Japan-based, Malaysia-born filmmaker Lim Kah Wai. His eighth feature explores the lesser-known aspects of the Asian melting pot city through the eyes and experiences of a dozen characters who struggle to find their place in society: among them a Nepali refugee with dreams of opening a restaurant, a Burmese student struggling to make ends meet while working two jobs, and a Taiwanese sex tourist who travels to meet his favorite adult video actress.

920712.name: Bunty Aur Babli
920712.overview: Bunty and Babli are two avid dreamers. Two free souls born into caged small town realities. They grow weary of being two specks on the horizon. They desire the horizon itself.And so they pack their aspirations in worn out bags, whip a scarf of confidence around their proud necks and set forth. On a journey across the length and breadth of the country, spinning circles around the people they meet.

parts.title: Bunty Aur Babli
parts.overview: Bunty and Babli are two avid dreamers. Two free souls born into caged small town realities. They grow weary of being two specks on the horizon. They desire the horizon itself.And so they pack their aspirations in worn out bags, whip a scarf of confidence around their proud necks and set forth. On a journey across the length and breadth of the country, spinning circles around the people they meet.

parts.title: Bunty Aur Babli 2
parts.overview: Bunty and Babli are forced out of retirement as a new pair of cons emerge, doing robberies in their name with their trademark sigil across India.

parts.title: PBTB E-san Indy
parts.original_title: ผู้บ่าวไทบ้าน อีสานอินดี้

parts.title: PBTB 2 E-san New Old Songs
parts.original_title: ผู้บ่าวไทบ้าน 2 ตอน แจกข้าวหาแม่ใหญ่แดง
parts.overview: "The House of Two Times, the rice to find a big red mother" is the story continues from the first.
